acid_palms_gorm.desc: Add 1d10 strength to your wound attempts when attacking with Fist & Tooth.
acid_palms_gorm.name: Acid Palms

ageless.desc: You may hunt if you are retired. When you gain Hunt XP, you may decide not to gain it.
ageless.name: Ageless

analyze.desc: At the start of the Survivors' turn, if you are adjacent to the monster, reveal the top AI card, then place back on top of the deck.
analyze.summary: Look at the top AI card and return it to the top of the deck.
analyze.name: Analyze

bitter_frenzy.desc: Each showdown, the first time you suffer the frenzy brain trauma, gain d10 survival. You may spend survival while Frenzied.
bitter_frenzy.name: Bitter Frenzy

blind.desc: Lose an eye. Suffer -1 permanent Accuracy. This injury is permanent and can be recorded twice. A survivor with two blind severe injuries suffers -4 permanent accuracy and retires at the end of the next showdown or settlement phase, having lost all sight. Gain 1 bleeding token.
blind.name: Blind

blue_glow.desc: <font class="kdm_font">a</font> Move a Portal terrain tile on the showdown board to Snow's space. If there are less than 2 Portals on the board, add one to Snow's space instead.
blue_glow.name: Blue Glow

blue_life_exchange.desc: In the Aftermath, gain 3 additional Hunt XP. You may not place other gear in your grid. Gain +1 permanent luck with each Age milestone. When you retire, you cease to exist.
blue_life_exchange.name: Blue Life Exchange

bone_witch_scarred_eyes.desc: Suffer -4 permanent Accuracy and gain +4 permanent strength.
bone_witch_scarred_eyes.name: Bone Witch - Scarred Eyes

bone_witch_wounds.desc: Suffer -1 permanent strength, -1 permanent accuracy and skip the next hunt.
bone_witch_wounds.name: Bone Witch - Wounds

broken_arm.desc: An ear-shattering crunch. Suffer -1 permanent Accuracy and -1 permanent Strength. This injury is permanent and can be recorded twice. Gain 1 bleeding token.
broken_arm.name: Broken arm

broken_hip.desc: Your hip is dislocated. You can no longer dodge. Suffer -1 permanent movement. This injury is permanent and can be recorded once. Gain 1 bleeding token.
broken_hip.name: Broken hip

broken_leg.desc: An ear-shattering crunch! Adjacent survivors suffer 1 brain damage. Suffer -1 permanent movement. This injury is permanent, and can be recorded twice. Gain 1 bleeding token.
broken_leg.name: Broken leg

broken_rib.desc: It even hurts to breathe. Suffer -1 permanent speed. This injury is permanent, and can be recorded multiple times. Gain 1 bleeding token.
broken_rib.name: Broken rib

bruised_tailbone.desc: The base of your spine is in agony. You cannot dash until showdown ends. You are knocked down. Gain 1 bleeding token.
bruised_tailbone.name: Bruised tailbone

caratosis.desc:
Before making an attack roll, you may declare "Caratosis X" in a loud, booming voice. If you do, that attack gains X automatic hits. X cannot be more than your total red affinities. When the attack ends, gain +X hunt Xp.
When you trigger Age 2, gain the Beast of Caratosis secret fighting art.
caratosis.name: Caratosis

collapsed_lung.desc: You can't catch a breath. Gain -1 movement token. Gain 1 bleeding token.
collapsed_lung.name: Collapsed Lung

concussion.desc: Your brain is scrambled like an egg. Gain a random disorder. Gain 1 bleeding token.
concussion.name: Concussion

contracture.desc: The arm will never be the same. Suffer -1 permanent Accuracy. This injury is permanent and can be recorded multiple times. Gain 1 bleeding token.
contracture.name: Contracture

crystal_skin.desc: You ignore cursed and cannot wear armor. When you depart, gain 3 to all hit locations. Suffer -2 to the result of all severe injury rolls. When you participate in Intimacy, newborns gain Crystal Skin in addition to any other roll results.
crystal_skin.name: Crystal Skin

deaf.desc: Suffer -1 permanent Evasion. This injury is permanent and can be recorded once.
deaf.name: Deaf

death_mehndi.desc: On a Perfect hit, gain 1d10 insanity. -4 to all brain trauma rolls.
death_mehndi.name: Death Mehndi

destroyed_back.desc: A sharp cracking noise. Suffer -2 permanent movement. You can no longer activate any gear that has 2+ Strength. This injury is permanent and can be recorded once. Gain 1 bleeding token.
destroyed_back.name: Destroyed back

destroyed_genitals.desc: You cannot be nominated for the Intimacy story event. This injury is permanent and can be recorded once. Gain a random disorder. You are knocked down. Gazing upwards, you wonder at the futility of your struggle. Gain +3 insanity. Gain 1 bleeding token.
destroyed_genitals.name: Destroyed genitals

destroyed_tooth.desc: If you have 3+ courage, you boldly spit the tooth out and gain +2 insanity! Otherwise. the blow sends you sprawling and you are knocked down.
destroyed_tooth.name: Destroyed tooth

disemboweled.desc: Your movement is reduced to 1 until the showdown ends. Gain 1 bleeding token. Skip the next hunt. If you suffer disemboweled during a showdown, at least one other survivor must live to the end of the showdown to carry you back to the settlement. Otherwise, at the end of the showdown, you are lost. Dead.
disemboweled.name: Disemboweled

dislocated_shoulder.desc: Pop! You cannot activate two-handed or paired weapons or use block until showdown ends. Gain 1 bleeding token.
dislocated_shoulder.name: Dislocated shoulder

dismembered_arm.desc: Lose an arm. You can no longer activate two-handed weapons. This injury is permanent, and can be recorded twice. A survivor with two dismembered arm severe injuries cannot activate any weapons. Gain 1 bleeding token.
dismembered_arm.name: Dismembered Arm

dismembered_leg.desc: Lose a leg. You suffer -2 permanent movement, and can no longer dash. This injury is permanent and can be recorded twice. A survivor with two dismembered leg severe injuries has lost both of their legs and must retire at the end of the next showdown or settlement phase. Gain 1 bleeding token.
dismembered_leg.name: Dismembered leg

dormenatus.desc:
When you suffer damage, you may declare 'Dormenatus X' in a loud, booming voice. If you do, gain x to each hit location. X cannot be more than your total green affinities. After the damage is resolved, gain +X hunt XP.
When you trigger Age 2, gain the Grace of Dormenatus secret fighting art.
dormenatus.name: Dormenatus

endless_babble.desc: When you depart, departing survivors gain +1 insanity. You may not encourage.
endless_babble.name: Endless Babble

explore.desc: When you roll on an investigate table, add +2 to your roll result.
explore.summary: Add +2 to your investigate roll results.
explore.name: Explore

fated_battle.desc: At the start of a showdown with the picked monster, gain +1 speed token.
fated_battle.name: Fated Battle

forgettable.name: Forgettable
forgettable.desc: Gain +2 permanent evasion. Forgettable survivors cannot be encouraged.

gaping_chest_wound.desc: Suffer -1 permanent Strength. This injury is permanent and can be recorded multiple times. Gain 1 bleeding token.
gaping_chest_wound.name: Gaping chest wound

gender_swap.desc: You own the Belt of Gender Swap, it will always take one space in your gear grid and while it is there, your gender is reversed.
gender_swap.name: Gender Swap

gigaslayer.desc: Gain +2 strength and +1 luck when attacking a 3x3 or larger monster. When you participate in Intimacy, newborns with your surname gain Gigaslayer in addition to any other benefits.
gigaslayer.name: Gigaslayer

green_glow.desc: <font class="kdm_font">a</font> Add <font class="inline_shield">1</font> to all hit locations.
green_glow.name: Green Glow

green_life_exchange.desc: In the Aftermath, gain 3 additional Hunt XP. You may not place other gear in your grid. Gain +1 permanent evasion with each Age milestone. When you retire, you cease to exist.
green_life_exchange.name: Green Life Exchange

hamstrung.desc: A painful rip. The leg is unusable. You can no longer use any fighting arts or abilities. This injury is permanent and can be recorded once. Gain 1 bleeding token.
hamstrung.name: Hamstrung

heart_of_the_sword.desc: If you gain weapon proficiency during the Aftermath, gain +3 additional ranks. You cough up a hunk of your own solidified blood and gain +1 Iron strange resource.
heart_of_the_sword.name: Heart of the Sword

hideous_disguise.name: Hideous Disguise
hideous_disguise.desc: At the start of the showdown, if you are fighting the Lion Knight, choose your Role card.

homing_instinct.name: Homing Instinct
homing_instinct.desc: Add +5 to your rolls on the Run Away story event.

intestinal_prolapse.desc: Your gut is gravely injured. You can no longer equip any gear on your waist, as it is too painful to wear. This injury is permanent, and can be recorded once. Gain 1 bleeding token.
intestinal_prolapse.name: Intestinal prolapse

intracranial_hemorrhage.name: Intracranial hemorrhage
intracranial_hemorrhage.desc: You can no longer use or gain any survival. This injury is permanent and can be recorded once. Gain 1 bleeding token.

iridescent_hide.desc: Gain +<font class="inline_shield">1</font> to all hit locations for each different-colored affinity in your gear grid.
iridescent_hide.name: Iridescent Hide

iron_will.name: Iron Will
iron_will.desc: You cannot be knocked down. Reduce all knockback you suffer to knockback 1.

legendcaller.desc: Once a lifetime, on a hunt board space after Overwhelming Darkness, in place of rolling a random hunt event, use "53" as your result.
legendcaller.name: Legendcaller

leprosy.desc: Reduce all damage suffered by 1 to a minimum of 1. Suffer -2 to severe injury rolls.
leprosy.name: Leprosy

leyline_walker.desc: While there is no armor or accessory gear in your grid, gain +3 evasion.
leyline_walker.name: Leyline Walker

life_exchange.desc: In the Aftermath, gain 1 additional Hunt XP. You may not wear other gear. If you trigger the White Secret story event, you cease to exist. When you retire, you cease to exist.
life_exchange.name: Life Exchange

limb_maker.desc: Once per settlement phase, spend 2 d to carve a prosthetic limb. Remove a survivor's dismembered injury and add 1 bone to the settlement's storage.
limb_maker.name: Limb-maker

lovelorn_rock.desc: Forever in love, the straggler loses one gear slot permanently to the rock. This survivor must always leave one gear space empty to hold their rock. The rock can be lost like normal gear.
lovelorn_rock.name: Lovelorn Rock

lucernae.desc:
Before making a wound attempt, you may declare "Lucernae X" in a loud, booming voice. If you do, that wound attempt gains X luck. X cannot be more than your total blue affinities. When the attack ends, you gain +X hunt XP.
When you trigger Age 2, gain the Lucernae's Lantern secret Fighting Art.
lucernae.name: Lucernae

mad_oracle.desc: Once per showdown, as a monster draws an AI, name a card out loud. If the AI card drawn is the card you named, gain +1 evasion token.
mad_oracle.name: Mad Oracle

marrow_hunger.desc: When the Murder or Skull Eater settlement events are drawn, this survivor is nominated.
marrow_hunger.name: Marrow Hunger

mastery_axe.name: Mastery - Axe
mastery_axe.desc: When an Axe Master wounds a monster with an axe at a location with a persistent injury, that wound becomes a critical wound.

mastery_bow.name: Mastery - Bow
mastery_bow.desc: If you are a Bow Master, all bows in your gear grid gain Deadly 2. In addition, ignore cumbersome on all Bows.

mastery_club.name: Mastery - Club
mastery_club.desc: When a Club Master attacks with a club, if a successful wound attempt total is greater than or equal to twice the monster's toughness, inflict an additional wound.

mastery_dagger.name: Mastery - Dagger
mastery_dagger.desc: After a wounded hit location is discarded, a Dagger Master who is adjacent to the attacker and the wounded monster may spend 1 survival to re-draw the wounded hit location and attempt to wound with a dagger. Treat monster reactions on the re-drawn hit location card normally.

mastery_fist_and_tooth.name: Mastery - Fist & Tooth
mastery_fist_and_tooth.desc: While a survivor is a Fist & Tooth Master, they gain +2 permanent accuracy and +2 permanent strength (they receive this bonus even when not attacking with Fist and Tooth).

mastery_grand_weapon.name: Mastery - Grand Weapon
mastery_grand_weapon.desc: When a Grand Weapon Master perfectly hits with a grand weapon, cancel all reactions for that attack.

mastery_katana.name: Mastery - Katana
mastery_katana.desc:
When a survivor reaches Katana Mastery, they leave the settlement forever, heeding the call of the storm to hone their art.
Before the master leaves, you may nominate a survivor. Set that survivor's weapon type to Katana and their weapon proficiency level to 1.

mastery_katar.name: Mastery - Katar
mastery_katar.desc: If you are a Katar Master, gain a +1 evasion token on a perfect hit with a katar. When you are knocked down, remove all +1 evasion tokens.

mastery_scythe.name: Mastery - Scythe
mastery_scythe.desc:
When you critically wound with a scythe, roll 1d10. On a 6+, shuffle the hit location deck (do not shuffle unresolved hit locations).
Limit, once per round.

mastery_shield.name: Mastery - Shield
mastery_shield.desc: When a Shield Master is adjacent to a survivor that is targeted by a monster, they may swap spaces on the board with the survivor and become the target instead. The master must have a shield to perform this.

mastery_spear.name: Mastery - Spear
mastery_spear.desc: Whenever a Spear Master hits a monster with a Separ, they may spend 1 survival to gain the Priority Target token. If they made the hit from directly behind another survivor, that survivor gains the Priority Target token instead.

mastery_sword.name: Mastery - Sword
mastery_sword.desc: A Sword master gains +1 accuracy, +1 strength, and +1 speed when attacking with a Sword.

mastery_twilight_sword.name: Mastery - Twilight Sword
mastery_twilight_sword.desc: Any Survivor who attains Twilight Sword Mastery leaves the settlement forever in pursuit of a higher purpose. Remove them from the settlement's population. You may place the master's Twilight Sword in another survivor's gear grid or archive it.

mastery_whip.name: Mastery - Whip
mastery_whip.desc: Whip Masters gain +5 strength when attacking with a Whip.

matchmaker.desc: When you are a returning survivor, once per year you may spend 1 Endeavor to trigger Intimacy (story event).
matchmaker.summary: Spend 1 endeavor to trigger Intimacy story event.
matchmaker.name: Matchmaker

metal_maw.desc: Your Fist & Tooth gains Sharp. (Add 1d10 strength to each wound attempt using this gear. This d10 is not a wound roll, and cannot cause critical wounds.)
metal_maw.name: Metal Maw

nightmare_blood.desc: Whenever you gain a bleeding token, add <font class="inline_shield">1</font> to all hit locations.
nightmare_blood.name: Nightmare Blood

nightmare_membrane.desc: You may spend <font class="kdm_font">a c</font> to exchange any 1 of your tokens for a +1 strength token.
nightmare_membrane.name: Nightmare Membrane

nightmare_spurs.desc: Once per showdown, you may spend all your survival (at least 1) to lose all your +1 strength tokens and gain that many +1 luck tokens.
nightmare_spurs.name: Nightmare Spurs

oracles_eye.desc: At the start of the showdown, look through the AI deck then shuffle.
oracles_eye.name: Oracle's Eye

partner.desc: When you both Arrive, gain survival up to the survival limit. Partners may only nominate each other for g Intimacy. When a partner dies, the remaining partner gains a random disorder and loses this ability.
partner.name: Partner

peerless.desc: When you gain insanity, you may gain an equal amount of survival.
peerless.name: Peerless

possessed.desc: Cannot use weapon specialization, weapon mastery, or fighting arts.
possessed.name: Possessed

prepared.desc: When rolling to determine a straggler, add your hunt experience to your roll result.
prepared.summary: Add Hunt XP to your roll when determining a straggler.
prepared.name: Prepared

presage.desc: Each time you attack, before drawing hit locations, loudly say a name. You lightly bite the eye in your cheek to see what it sees. If you draw any hit locations with that name, gain +3 insanity and +10 strength when attempting to wound them.
presage.name: Presage

pristine.desc: When you suffer a dismembered severe injury, ignore it and gain 1 bleeding token instead.
pristine.name: Pristine

psychovore.desc: Once per showdown, you may eat an adjacent survivor's disorder. If you do, remove the disorder. They gain 1 bleeding token and you gain +1 permanent strength. At the end of the showdown, if you haven't eaten a disorder, you die.
psychovore.name: Psychovore

red_glow.desc: <font class="kdm_font">a</font> Make a melee attack with speed 3, accuracy 7+, and strength 5.
red_glow.name: Red Glow

red_life_exchange.desc: In the Aftermath, gain 3 additional Hunt XP. You may not place other gear in your grid. Gain +1 permanent strength with each Age milestone. When you retire, you cease to exist.
red_life_exchange.name: Red Life Exchange

reflection.desc:
• Your complete affinities and incomplete affinity halves count as all colors.
  • You may dodge at any time and as many times as you like each round.
  • When you attack from a blind spot, add +1d10 to all wound attempts for that attack.
reflection.name: Reflection

refraction.desc:
• Your complete affinities and incomplete affinity halves count as all colors.
  • During the Showdown, after you perform a survival action, gain +1 survival.
refraction.name: Refraction

rivals_scar.name: Rival's Scar
rivals_scar.desc: Gain +1 permanent strength and -1 permanent evasion.

rooted_to_all.desc: If you are standing at the start of your act, reveal the top 2 cards of the AI deck and put them back in any order.
rooted_to_all.name: Rooted to All

ruptured_muscle.desc: A painful rip. The arm hangs limp. You can no longer activate fighting arts. This injury is permanent and can be recorded once. Gain 1 bleeding token.
ruptured_muscle.name: Ruptured muscle

ruptured_spleen.desc: A vicious body blow. Skip the next hunt. Gain 2 bleeding tokens.
ruptured_spleen.name: Ruptured spleen

shattered_jaw.desc: You drink your meat through a straw. You can no longer consume or be affected by events requiring you to consume. You can no longer encourage. This injury is permanent and can be recorded once. Gain 1 bleeding token.
shattered_jaw.name: Shattered jaw

slashed_back.desc: Making sudden movement is excruciatingly painful. You cannot surge until showdown ends. Gain 1 bleeding token.
slashed_back.name: Slashed back

sleeping_virus_flower.name: Sleeping Virus Flower
sleeping_virus_flower.desc: When you die, a flower blooms from your corpse. Add g A Warm Virus to the timeline next year. You are the guest.

solid.desc: If you would be knocked down, roll 1d10. On a 4+, you are not knocked down.
solid.name: Solid

sour_death.desc: When you are knocked down, you may encourage yourself (even if you're deaf). If you do, gain +1 strength token.
sour_death.name: Sour Death

axe_specialization.name: Specialization - Axe
axe_specialization.desc: When attacking with an axe, if your wound attempt fails, you may ignore it and attempt to wound the selected hit location again. Limit, once per attack.

bow_specialization.name: Specialization - Bow
bow_specialization.desc: When attacking with a bow, you may reroll any misses once. Limit, once per attack.

club_specialization.name: Specialization - Club
club_specialization.desc:
When attacking with a club, on a perfect hit, double your wound attempt total on the first selected hit location.
Limit, once per attack.

dagger_specialization.name: Specialization - Dagger
dagger_specialization.desc: When attacking with a Dagger, if a wound attempt fails, after performing any reactions, you may discard another drawn hit location card to attempt to wound that hit location again. Limit, once per attack.

fist_and_tooth_specialization.name: Specialization - Fist & Tooth
fist_and_tooth_specialization.desc: You may stand (if knocked down) at the start of the monster's turn or the survivor's turn. Limit once per round.

grand_weapon_specialization.name: Specialization - Grand Weapon
grand_weapon_specialization.desc:
When attacking with a grand weapon, gain +1 accuracy.
When attacking with a Grand Weapon during your act, if you critically wound, the monster is knocked down.

katana_specialization.name: Specialization - Katana
katana_specialization.desc:
You may not select this as your weapon type.
If you are blind and have 4+ levels of Katana proficiency, gain the following:
On your first Perfect Hit each attack with a Katana, do not draw a hit location. The monster suffers 1 wound.

katar_specialization.name: Specialization - Katar
katar_specialization.desc: When attacking with a Katar, cancel reactions on the first selected hit location.

scythe_specialization.name: Specialization - Scythe
scythe_specialization.desc:
When you critically wound with a scythe, roll 1d10. On a 6+, shuffle the hit location deck (do not shuffle unresolved hit locations).
Limit, once per round.

shield_specialization.name: Specialization - Shield
shield_specialization.desc: While a shield is in your gear grid, you are no longer knocked down after collision with a monster. While a shield is in your gear grid, add 1 to all hit locations.

spear_specialization.name: Specialization - Spear
spear_specialization.desc: When attacking with a spear, if you draw a trap, roll 1d10. On a 7+, cancel the trap. Discard it, then reshuffle the hit location discard into the hit location deck and draw a new card. Limit, once per round.

sword_specialization.name: Specialization - Sword
sword_specialization.desc: When attacking with a sword, after drawing hit locations, make a wound attempt and then select a hit location to resolve with that result. Limit, once per attack.

twilight_sword_specialization.name: Specialization - Twilight Sword
twilight_sword_specialization.desc: This sentient sword improves as it's used. Gain the effect as proficiency rank increases. Rank 2: Ignore Cumbersome on Twilight Sword. Rank 4: When attacking with the Twilight Sword, ignore slow and gain +2 speed. Rank 6: Twilight Sword gains Deadly.

whip_specialization.name: Specialization - Whip
whip_specialization.desc: When you wound with a whip, instead of moving the top card of the AI deck into the wound stack, you may move the top card of the AI discard pile. Limit once per attack.

spiral_fracture.desc: Your arm twists unnaturally. Gain -2 strength tokens. Skip the next hunt. Gain 1 bleeding token.
spiral_fracture.name: Spiral fracture

stalwart.desc: Ignore being knocked down by brain trauma and intimidation actions.
stalwart.summary: Can't be knocked down by brain trauma or intimidate.
stalwart.name: Stalwart

story_of_the_forsaker.desc: You cannot be knocked down during a showdown with a nemesis monster.
story_of_the_forsaker.name: Story of the Forsaker

story_of_the_goblin.desc: Once per showdown you may...roll 1d10. On a 3+, gain the priority target token and the monster gains +1 damage token.
story_of_the_goblin.name: Story of the Goblin

story_of_the_young_hero.desc: At the start of your act, you may...[g]ain 2 bleeding tokens and +1 survival.
story_of_the_young_hero.name: Story of the Young Hero

super_hair.desc: You may spend a to freely exchange any tokens with adjacent survivors who have Super Hair.
super_hair.name: Super Hair

sweet_battle.desc: Once per round, you may surge without spending survival. If you do, the Activation must be used to activate the weapon.
sweet_battle.name: Sweet Battle

thundercaller.desc: Once a lifetime, on a hunt board space after Overwhelming Darkness, in place of rolling a random hunt event, use "100" as your result.
thundercaller.name: Thundercaller

tinker.desc: When you are a returning survivor, gain +1 Endeavor to use this settlement phase.
tinker.name: Tinker

torn_achilles_tendon.desc: Your leg cannot bear your weight. Until the end of the showdown, whenever you suffer light, heavy, or severe injury, you are also knocked down. Skip the next hunt. Gain 1 bleeding token.
torn_achilles_tendon.name: Torn Achilles Tendon

torn_muscle.desc: Your quadriceps is ripped to shreds. You cannot dash until he showdown ends. Skip the next hunt. Gain 1 bleeding token.
torn_muscle.name: Torn muscle

twelve_fingers.desc: You cannot carry two-handed gear. On a Perfect hit, your right hand pulses. Gain +5 insanity and +1 luck for the attack. However, for each natural 1 rolled when attempting to hit, your left hand shakes. Suffer 5 brain damage and -1 luck for the attack.
twelve_fingers.name: Twelve Fingers

twilight_succession.desc: If you die during the showdown and have a Twilight Sword, nominate another survivor on the showdown board to gain the Twilight Sword and this ability.
twilight_succession.name: Twilight Succession

twilight_sword.desc: You may select Twilight Sword as a weapon proficiency type. This weapon may not be removed from your gear grid for any reason. When you die, archive your Twilight Sword card.
twilight_sword.name: Twilight Sword

warped_pelvis.desc: Your pelvis is disfigured. Suffer -1 permanent luck. This injury is permanent and can be recorded multiple times. Gain 1 bleeding token.
warped_pelvis.name: Warped Pelvis

way_of_the_rust.desc: Your bleeding tokens are also +1 evasion tokens.
way_of_the_rust.name: Way of the Rust

help.tip: As of Monster version 1.5, the Watcher is no longer automatically included in settlement Timelines. You must first add the Watcher to your settlement's Nemesis Monsters list before you may add an encounter with it to your Timeline.

people_of_the_skull.name: People of the Skull
people_of_the_skull.subtitle: Always displays the alternate rules and endeavors on p.213 of the core game manual on the Campaign Summary view.

special_rules.name: People of the Skull
special_rules.desc: Survivors can only place weapons and armor with the bone keyword in their gear grid. The people of the skull ignore the Frail rule.

special_rules.name: People of the Skull
special_rules.desc: When you name a survivor, if they have the word bone or skull in their name, in addition to +1 survival, players choose to gain +1 permanent accuracy, evasion, strength, luck or speed.

special_rules.name: Black Skull
special_rules.desc: If a weapon or armor is made with the Black Skull resource, a survivor may place it in their gear grid despite being iron.

special_rules.name: Removed Story Events
special_rules.desc: If an event or card would cause you to add/trigger Hands of Heat, Regal Visit, Armored Strangers, Watched, or Nemesis Encounter - Watcher, do nothing instead.

nemesis_encounter.name: Nemesis Encounter - Dragon King Human Lvl 1
Nemesis Encounter - Dragon King Human Lvl 2
Nemesis Encounter - Dragon King Human Lvl 3

the_bloom_people.name: The Bloom People
the_bloom_people.settlement_buff: All survivors are born with +1 permanent luck, +1 permanent green affinity and -2 permanent red affinities.

help.tip:
When starting a new "The Bloom People" campaign, any survivors who are not created with parents, including the first generation of survivors, whether added manually or via the "First Story" macro during settlement creation, do not benefit from the campaign's intrinsic settlement bonus.
  The rule states that "All survivors are born with +1 permanent luck, +1 permanent green affinity and -2 permanent red affinities," and foundingsurvivors are not born.

the_green_knight.name: The Green Knight
the_green_knight.subtitle: A campaign following the 'People of the Lantern' timeline that includes all content required by the Green Knight Armor expansion.

absent_seizures.flavor_text: No one knows where your mind goes when you're gone, not even you.
absent_seizures.name: Absent Seizures
absent_seizures.survivor_effect: The first time you would suffer a brain trauma each showdown, you are instead knocked down and forget a fighting art (erase it).

aichmophobia.flavor_text: Sharp things make you uncomfortable. It's just a matter of time before someone cuts themselves.
aichmophobia.name: Aichmophobia
aichmophobia.survivor_effect: You cannot activate or depart with axes, swords, spears, daggers, scythes, or katars in your gear grid.

anxiety.flavor_text: You are afraid of being afraid. You're a nervous wreck, and monsters can smell this in your scent.
anxiety.name: Anxiety
anxiety.survivor_effect: At the start of each showdown, gain the priority target token unless you have stinky gear in your gear grid.

apathetic.flavor_text: You've given up. Nothing seems to matter. You have no concern for your own wellbeing.
apathetic.name: Apathetic
apathetic.survivor_effect: You cannot use or gain survival. You cannot gain courage. Cure this disorder if you have 8+ understanding.

arithmophilia.flavor_text: You love numbers. Your life must exist in perfect arithmetical harmony.
arithmophilia.name: Arithmophilia
arithmophilia.survivor_effect:
When you gain this disorder, roll 1d5. Your movement is that number.
Ignore all other movement modifiers.

binge_eating_disorder.flavor_text: Eating is the only thing that helps you escape your miserable life.
binge_eating_disorder.name: Binge Eating
binge_eating_disorder.survivor_effect: You cannot depart unless you have consumable gear in your gear grid. You must consume if a choice to consume arises.

controlophobia.flavor_text: You are deeply afraid of being the monster controller.
controlophobia.name: Controlophobia
controlophobia.survivor_effect: While you are the monster controller, double any damage you suffer.

coprolalia.flavor_text: You have compulsive tics in the form of sporadic muttering, cursing, whimpering, and screaming.
coprolalia.name: Coprolalia
coprolalia.survivor_effect: All your gear is noisy. You are always a threat unless you are knocked down, even if an effect says otherwise.

delicious.flavor_text: Predators of all shapes and sizes find your scent irresistible.
delicious.name: Delicious
delicious.survivor_effect: You are still considered a threat when you are knocked down (unless you use an effect that says otherwise).

destined.flavor_text: You have a grand destiny that you must fulfill.
destined.name: Destined
destined.survivor_effect: If you do not depart, lose all survival and insanity.

emotionless.flavor_text: You don't have any emotions. You've hidden this from everyone by mimicking their social interactions.
emotionless.name: Emotionless

enfeebled.flavor_text: You are delicate flower, wilting in the darkness.
enfeebled.name: Enfeebled
enfeebled.survivor_effect: It takes one less bleeding token to kill you.

fear_of_the_dark.flavor_text: You cannot bear the oppressive darkness any longer.
fear_of_the_dark.name: Fear of the Dark
fear_of_the_dark.survivor_effect:
You retire.
If you gain this disorder during a hunt or showdown, you put on a brave face until you return to the settlement, vowing never to leave the Lantern Hoard again.

flower_addiction.flavor_text: An insatiable hunger has bloomed in you, delicate and sickeningly sweet.
flower_addiction.name: Flower Addiction
flower_addiction.survivor_effect:
You may only depart to hunt the Flower Knight.
After you depart, cure this disorder.

ghostly_beauty.flavor_text: You cannot experience fear if you do not exist.
ghostly_beauty.name: Ghostly Beauty
ghostly_beauty.survivor_effect:
Double all insanity you gain.
Double all survival you spend.

hemophobia.flavor_text: The mere sight of blood makes you lightheaded, and serious gore can knock you out!
hemophobia.name: Hemophobia
hemophobia.survivor_effect: During the showdown, whenever a survivor (including you) gains a bleeding token, you are knocked down.

hoarder.name: Hoarder
hoarder.flavor_text: You compulsively collect and stash anything you can get your hands on. Every little bit you add to your secret hoard makes your existence feel more real.
hoarder.survivor_effect: Whenever you are a returning survivor, archive 1 resource gained from the last showdown and gain +1 courage.

honorable.flavor_text: You believe in honor and fairness when conducting yourself on the battlefield. It is these strong principles that have kept you alive, and you will not abandon them under any circumstances.
honorable.name: Honorable
honorable.survivor_effect: You cannot attack a monster from its blind spot or if it is knocked down.

hyper_sensitivity.flavor_text: Your will to survive has become indefatigable
hyper_sensitivity.name: Hyper-Sensitivity
hyper_sensitivity.survivor_effect:
You may dodge one additional time per round.
Whenever you are hit by an attack, you must dodge at least once, if possible.

hyperactive.flavor_text: Whether you are running, fiddling with your gear, or pacing, you are always moving.
hyperactive.name: Hyperactive
hyperactive.survivor_effect: During the showdown, you must move at least 1 space every round.

immortal.flavor_text: You are immortal! You will live forever and cannot be killed.
immortal.name: Immortal
immortal.survivor_effect:
While you are insane, convert all damage dealt to your hit locations to brain damage.
You are so busy reveling in your own glory that you cannot spend survival while insane.

indecision.flavor_text: Past decisions haunt you ceaselessly. You are crippled by indecision, and even the most trivial choices grip you with terror.
indecision.name: Indecision
indecision.survivor_effect: If you are the event revealer of hunt events that call on you to make a roll, roll twice and use the lower result.

megalophobia.flavor_text: Even large, looming shadows make you jumpy.
megalophobia.name: Megalophobia
megalophobia.survivor_effect: You may not depart for hunts or showdowns with monsters that occupy more than 4 spaces on the showdown board.

monster_panic.flavor_text: Monsters make you feel bad. Really, really bad.
monster_panic.name: Monster Panic
monster_panic.survivor_effect: Whenever you suffer brain damage from an Intimidate action, suffer 1 additional brain damage.

motion_sickness.name: Motion Sickness
motion_sickness.survivor_effect: Whenever you suffer knockback, gain 1 bleeding token.

narcissistic.flavor_text: There is nothing in the world more beautiful than yourself.
narcissistic.name: Narcissistic
narcissistic.survivor_effect: You may not wear armor at the head location. If you are wearing armor at the head location when you gain this disorder, archive it.

overprotective.flavor_text: You love the feeling of being needed.
overprotective.name: Overprotective
overprotective.survivor_effect: When an adjacent survivor is knocked down, you are also knocked down as you rush to their aid.

performance_anxiety.name: Performance Anxiety
performance_anxiety.survivor_effect:
You cannot be nominated for Intimacy.
Cure this disorder if you have 8+ courage.

post_traumatic_stress.flavor_text: The last hunt was harrowing. All you can do is cower and relive the trauma. Only time can heal your wounds.
post_traumatic_stress.name: Post-Traumatic Stress
post_traumatic_stress.survivor_effect: Next settlement phase, you do not contribute or participate in any endeavors. Skip the next hunt to recover.

prey.flavor_text: You are prey. All there is for you is death.
prey.name: Prey
prey.survivor_effect: You may not spend survival unless you are insane.

primma_donna.flavor_text: The double-edged sword of fame is the only weapon you require.
primma_donna.name: Prima Donna
primma_donna.survivor_effect: Each survivor turn, you must take your act first (roll off each turn if multiple survivors have this disorder).

quixotic.flavor_text: You carry the weight of your settlement on your shoudlers. Everyone is counting on you to save them, and you will rise to the challenge.
quixotic.name: Quixotic
quixotic.survivor_effect: If you are insane when you depart, gain +1 survival and +1 Strength token.

rageholic.flavor_text: Your rage boils out of control, causing you to see red at the slightest provocation.
rageholic.name: Rageholic
rageholic.survivor_effect: Whenever you suffer a severe injury, also suffer the frenzy brain trauma.

revenge.flavor_text: When a fellow hunter perishes you lose control.
revenge.name: Revenge
revenge.survivor_effect: When a survivors dies during the showdown, suffer the Frenzy brain trauma.

secretive.flavor_text: You love secrets. So much, in fact, that you pretend to have many.
secretive.name: Secretive
secretive.survivor_effect: When you are a returning survivor, you quickly become preoccuiped with your own affairs. You must skip the next hunt to deal with them.

seizures.flavor_text: Lingering damage from your head injuries has caused you to experience periods of uncontrollable shaking and absence of thought.
seizures.name: Seizures
seizures.survivor_effect: During the showdown, whenever you suffer damage to your head location, you are knocked down.

shallow_lungs.name: Shallow Lungs
shallow_lungs.survivor_effect: When you encourage, you are knocked down.

spiral_ganglia.flavor_text: The roads in your mind cross and reveal a strange new path.
spiral_ganglia.name: Spiral Ganglia
spiral_ganglia.survivor_effect: At the start of the showdown, gain the Darkness Awareness survivor status card.

squeamish.name: Squeamish
squeamish.survivor_effect: You cannot depart with any stinky gear in your gear grid. If a status or effect would cause you to become stinky, lose all your survival.

stage_fright.flavor_text: You hate being the center of attention.
stage_fright.name: Stage Fright
stage_fright.survivor_effect: Whenever you become doomed or gain the priority target token, lose 1 survival.

stark_raving.flavor_text: Freedom awaits those pushed this far beyond the breaking point.
stark_raving.name: Stark Raving
stark_raving.survivor_effect: You are always insane, regardless of your insanity.

sun_drunk.flavor_text: When your emotions rise, you can only think of violence.
sun_drunk.name: Sun-Drunk
sun_drunk.survivor_effect: When you have any +1 strength tokens, you cannot dash, dodge or g Run Away.

superstitious.flavor_text: Evil magic will be your undoing. You do not believe in abusing the other.
superstitious.name: Superstitious
superstitious.survivor_effect: You cannot activate or depart with other gear in your gear grid.

sworn_enemy.name: Sworn Enemy
sworn_enemy.survivor_effect: When you gain this, choose a monster. You may only depart to face the chosen monster. Your attacks against the chosen monster gain +1 speed and +1 strength.

tiny_arachnophobia.flavor_text: You are irrationally scared by tiny spiders and the things they produce.
tiny_arachnophobia.name: Tiny Arachnophobia
tiny_arachnophobia.survivor_effect: You cannot carry any gear with the amber keyword. You cannot gain any resources with the silk keyword.

traumatized.flavor_text: Your experiences have left you shaken and paralyzed by fear.
traumatized.name: Traumatized
traumatized.survivor_effect: Whenever you end your act adjacent to a monster, you are knocked down.

tunnel_vision.flavor_text: If you're not killing something, you're wasting your time.
tunnel_vision.name: Tunnel Vision
tunnel_vision.survivor_effect: When you spend <font class="kdm_font">a</font>, you may only activate weapons.

unlucky.flavor_text: Your mother always said you were born under a bad sign.
unlucky.name: Unlucky

vermin_obsession.name: Vermin Obsession
vermin_obsession.survivor_effect: While there is a Bug Spot terrain tile on the showdown board, you are so overwhelmed that you are doomed.

vestiphobia.flavor_text: Even the lightest armor rubs harshly against your skin and constricts your ability to move.
vestiphobia.name: Vestiphobia
vestiphobia.survivor_effect: You cannot wear armor at the body location. If you are wearing armor at the body location when you gain this disorder, archive it as you tear it off your person!

weak_spot.name: Weak Spot
weak_spot.survivor_effect: When you gain this disorder, roll a random hit location and record it. You cannot depart unless you have armor at this hit location.

mask_maker_1.name: Antelope Mask
mask_maker_1.desc: Antelope Mask. You may hunt the Mad Steed.

shrine_armor_ritual.name: Armor Ritual
shrine_armor_ritual.desc: May be used once per settlement phase.

organ_grinder_augury.name: Augury
organ_grinder_augury.desc: roll 1d10. The survivor endeavors to glean the meaning of existence. Roll on the table. Add +1 to your roll result if your understanding is 3 or higher.

black_guard_style.name: Black Guard Style
black_guard_style.desc: During the settlement phase you may spend d to train a survivor. They gain the Black Guard Style secret fighting art. You lose it and suffer the broken arm severe injury.

subterranean_agriculture_2_build_wet_res.name: Build
subterranean_agriculture_2_build_wet_res.desc: Wet Resin Crafter (2 x organ, 2 x bone)

dark_water_research_1.name: Dark Water Research
dark_water_research_1.desc: Spend 2x resources and 2x Dark Water to increase the level of Dark Water Research by 1, to a maximum of 3. (Update your settlement record sheet.)

fear_and_trembling.name: Fear and Trembling
fear_and_trembling.desc: Once per settlement phase, a survivor may spend <font class="kdm_font">d</font> to approach the throne and roll 1d10.

pottery_fermentation.name: Fermentation
pottery_fermentation.desc: Spend 1 organ resource and gain 1 Love Juice basic resource. Limit, once per lantern year.

shadow_dancing_final_dance.name: Final Dance
shadow_dancing_final_dance.desc: You may only endeavor here if a survivor died during the last hunt or showdown. Once per year, roll 1d10.

bloom_people_forest_run.name: Forest Run
bloom_people_forest_run.desc: You may exchange any number of monster resources for that number of random Flower resources.

stone_circle_harvest_ritual.name: Harvest Ritual
stone_circle_harvest_ritual.desc: Spend any number of monster esources to draw an equal number of basic resources.

scarification_initiation.name: Initiation
scarification_initiation.desc: Once per lifetime, gain +1 courage and roll the hit location die.

innovate.name: Innovate
innovate.desc: Once per settlement phase, you may spend the listed resources to draw 2 innovation cards. Keep 1 and return the other to the deck.

sculpture_0.name: Inspirational Statue
sculpture_0.desc: You create an Inspirational Statue. Skip the next hunt and lose a fighting art. Record this fighting art on the Settlement Record Sheet. A settlement can only have one Inspirational Statue. (You cannot make another! Secret fighting arts are not fighting arts!)

guidepost_default.name: Lantern Halberd
guidepost_default.desc: The survivor attempts to pull the weapon free from the ground. Roll 1d10 and add their strength. If the result is 12+, gain the Lantern Halberd rare gear and lose this innovation (archive this card).

leather_worker_leather_making.name: Leather-Making
leather_worker_leather_making.desc: Spend any number of hide to add an equal number of leather strange resources to the settlement storage.

lion_knight_white_mask_leave_the_monster.name: Leave the monster an offering
lion_knight_white_mask_leave_the_monster.desc: Leave the monster an offering. Spend 1 resource and roll 1d10.

legless_ball_1.name: Legless Ball
legless_ball_1.desc: A survivor with 10+ insanity may put the Spidicules out of its misery. Gain the Grinning Visage rare gear and lose this innovation. (Archive this card.)

lights_in_the_sky_02.name: Lights in the Sky: Face Painting
lights_in_the_sky_02.selector_text: Lights in the Sky: Face Painting

lights_in_the_sky_03.name: Lights in the Sky: Inner Lantern
lights_in_the_sky_03.selector_text: Lights in the Sky: Inner Lantern

limb_maker.name: Limb-maker
limb_maker.desc: Once per settlement phase, spend 2 d to carve a prosthetic limb. Remove a survivor's dismembered injury and add 1 bone to the settlement's storage.

war_room_default.name: Make a plan
war_room_default.desc: The hunt team makes a plan. The group may reroll 1 Hunt Event Table result (d100) this lantern year. They must reroll before performing the event.

momento_mori_default.name: Momento Mori
momento_mori_default.desc: Nominate a survivor that died in the last showdown and roll id10.

records_1_monster_volume.name: Moster Volume
records_1_monster_volume.desc: You laboriously create a volume about a monster you have defeated during your lifetime. Add "Monster Name" Vol. X where X is the level of the defeated monster to the Settlement Record Sheet. The work is exhausting, you retire. There can be up to 3 volumes for each monster.

partnership_default.name: Partnership
partnership_default.desc: Nominate two survivors. They pair off, and each gains the Partner ability. A survivor may be nominated for Partnership once per lifetime.

mask_maker_2.name: Phoenix Mask
mask_maker_2.desc: Phoenix Mask. You may hunt the Golden Eyed King.

subterranean_agriculture_1.name: Preserved Caustic Dung
subterranean_agriculture_1.desc: If Black Harvest is on the timeline you may spend 1 Preserved Caustic Dung to increase its rank by 1 to a maximum rank of 3. Limit, once per settlement phase.

sacred_pool_1.name: Purification Ceremony
sacred_pool_1.desc: You may endeavor here once per lifetime. Your body is infused with sacred water and Purified (record this). You cannot depart this year. Gain the Protective disorder and roll 1d10. On 8+ gain +1 permanent attribute of your choice. Otherwise, gain +1 permanent strength or accuracy.

pottery_ret.name: Ret
pottery_ret.desc: Spend 1 herb resource and gain 1 hide basic resource. Limit, once per lantern year.

sacred_pool_0.name: Sacred Water
sacred_pool_0.desc: Once per settlement phase, the settlement drinks the oil that builds up on the surface of the pool. g Intimacy.

records_0_scholar_of_death.name: Scholar of Death
records_0_scholar_of_death.desc: You gain the Scholar of Death secret fighting art.

silk_refining_1.name: Silk Refining
silk_refining_1.desc: Convert 1 silk resource in 1 hide basic resource.

potskull_skull_ritual.name: Skull Ritual
potskull_skull_ritual.desc: Cost: 1 skull resource, 1 endeavor. Nominate up to four survivors to consume the skull. They gain a permanent +1 to all their attributes.

choreia_spider_dance.name: Spider Dance
choreia_spider_dance.desc: Spider Dance. Nominate a male and a female survivor and roll 1d10.

cooking_stone_nose_gruel.name: Stone Nose Gruel
cooking_stone_nose_gruel.desc: Spend 1 organ and 1 bone to cook stone nose gruel. During the next Hunt phase, ignore Starvation.

sculpture_1.name: Study the Inspirational Statue
sculpture_1.desc: You study the inspirational statue. Roll 1d10. On a 6+, gain the recorded fighting art.

sacred_pool_2.name: Sun Sealing
sacred_pool_2.desc: You sit for a year, in the boiling darkness of the Shrine. Gain the Hellfire secret fighting art. You cannot depart this year.

subterranean_agriculture_0.name: Underground Sow
subterranean_agriculture_0.desc: If Black Harvest is not on the timeline, g Underground Sow.

mask_maker_0.name: White Lion Mask
mask_maker_0.desc: White Lion Mask. You may hunt the Great Golden Cat.

stoic_statue_worship_the_monster.name: Worship the monster
stoic_statue_worship_the_monster.desc: Worship the monster. You may not depart or endeavor again this settlement phase. Roll 1d10.

dk_death_of_the_dragon_king.name: Death of the Dragon King
dk_death_of_the_dragon_king.selector_text: Death of the Dragon King (Dragon King)

max_courage.name: Max Courage
max_courage.desc: The max value a survivor may have for this attribute is nine.

max_understanding.name: Max Understanding
max_understanding.desc: The max value a survivor may have for this attribute is nine.

max_weapon_proficiency.name: Max Weapon Proficiency
max_weapon_proficiency.desc: The max value a survivor may have for this attribute is nine.

retired.name: Retired
retired.desc: Retired survivors cannot depart, but still contribute to the total population of the settlement, and may participate in settlement events and endeavors.

dbk_rumbling_in_the_dark.name: Rumbling in the Dark
dbk_rumbling_in_the_dark.selector_text: Rumbling in the Dark (Dung Beetle Knight)

promo_story_in_the_snow.name: Story in the Snow
promo_story_in_the_snow.selector_text: Story in the Snow (Holiday White Speaker Nico)

spid_forest_wants_what_it_wants.name: The Forest Wants What it Wants
spid_forest_wants_what_it_wants.selector_text: The Forest Wants What it Wants (Spidicules)

beta_challenge_scenarios.name: Beta Challenge Scenarios
beta_challenge_scenarios.subtitle: Enables abilities & impairments, disorders, items etc. included in the (cancelled) Beta Challenge Scenarios.

special_rules.name: Survival Limit Warning!
special_rules.desc: Survival Limit is not automatically enforced by the Manager when Beta Challenge Scenarios content is enabled.

help.tip: The Survival Limit is not enforced on any survivor's sheet when this expansion content is enabled for a settlement!
The "Destiny Husk" referenced on p.5 of the rules is understood to refer to the Husk of Destiny Rare Gear.
Calcified gear is selectable from the Black Harvest section of the Settlement Storage controls.
The "Regenerating Blade" is Rare Gear and can be found in that section of the Settlement Storage controls.
The Twilight Sword cannot be named by survivors with the Sword Oath Fighting Art because it does not have the sword keyword.
Though she ships in a White Box, Fade is expansion content, according to the Kingdom Death store. For this reason, Fade is separate from other White Box content in the Manager.

kd_collection_fighting_arts_and_disorder.name: Fighting Arts & Disorders
kd_collection_fighting_arts_and_disorder.subtitle: Check this box to include the Fighting Arts and Disorders from the expansions in your KD Collection in this campaign.

help.tip: Vespertine and other expansion-specific gear is organized under the Sense Memory heading in the Settlement Storage controls.

The Story event The Approaching Storm is added automatically to new settlements, but if you have to remove or move it, be careful to look for it near events whose title starts with "T", rather than "A".

green_knight_armor.name: Green Knight Armor
green_knight_armor.subtitle: Crafting GKA items requires DBK, Flower Knight, Lion Knight and Gorm expansions!

help.tip: Crafting Green Knight Armor requires resources, gear and innovations from the Dung Beetle Knight, Flower Knight, Lion Knight and Gorm expansions.
The recipe for Fetorsaurus includes a reference to the non-existent "Elixir of Life" gear. This is generally understood to mean the Gorm expansion's "Life Elixir" gear.
AI card references to "Lonely Fruit" are generally understood to refer to the monster's "Nightmare Fruit" AI card.
References to "Festering Blood Fruit" are generally understood to refer to "Blistering Plasma Fruit".
The Basic Action card for the Lonely Tree refers to an action called "germinate", which is generally understood to refer to "Growth", i.e. the Lonely Tree's Instinct.

oktoberfest_aya.name: Oktoberfest Aya
oktoberfest_aya.subtitle: Includes crafting recipes that require Lonely Tree.

help.tip: The recipe for Afterdeath Brew requires the Blistering Plasma Fruit Strange Resource from the Lonely Tree expansion. Enabling Oktoberfest Aya for a settlement that does not also have Lonely Tree enabled will prevent the Manager from displaying the recipe correctly!

promo.name: Promo
promo.subtitle: Adds promotional events, gear, Abilities & Impairments, etc. to Settlement and Survivor Sheet drop-down lists. Collects the following releases: Allison the Twilight Knight, Before the Wall, Beyond the Wall, Black Friday Ninja, Detective Twilight Knight, Halloween Pinup Twilight Knight, Pinup Easter Aya, Pinup Easter Twilight Knight, Pinup Devil Satan (Halloween 2018), Pinup Order Knight, Pinup Sci-fi Twilight Knight, Pinup Sci-fi White Speaker, Pinup Warrior of the Sun, Pinup Wet Nurse, Pinups of Death, Valentine's Day Pinup Twilight Knight, White Speaker.

help.tip: According to KDU #18, "Promo cards are intended as light-hearted content that is created for fun and should not be taken seriously in the context of Monster. Promos are not considered official additions to the rules and players should add them at the discretion of each player group."
Most Promo gear cards are Rare Gear, but a few of them have recipes! If you are looking for a specific gear card and cannot find it, make sure to check both locations!

santa_satan.name: Santa Satan (promo)
santa_satan.subtitle: This promo release from Holiday 2018 contains the 🞕 Atmostpheric Change Strain Milestone.

help.tip: The 🞕 Atmospheric Change Strain Milestone condition requires one of two story events from separate expansion content: the g Story in the Snow story event belongs to the White Speaker Nico expansion and the g Necrotoxic Mistletoe story event is from the Flower Knight expansion.

kd_collection_settlement_events.name: Settlement Events
kd_collection_settlement_events.subtitle: Check this box to include the Settlement Events from the expansions in your KD Collection in this campaign.

swashbuckler.name: Swashbuckler
swashbuckler.subtitle: One of the few figures from the Generic line that also includes game content.

abyssal_sadist.desc:
The first time you wound the monster each attack, gain +1 survival and +1 insanity.
Ignore the effects of the Fear of the Dark and Prey disorders.
abyssal_sadist.name: Abyssal Sadist

acanthus_doctor.desc:
You may wear up to 3 Satchel gear cards.
When you depart, if you are not wearing any armor, for each █ you have, gain +1 strength token and add 1 to all hit locations.
Spend a and a Flower or Fresh Acanthus resource to heal a permanent injury you or an adjacent survivor suffered this showdown.
acanthus_doctor.name: Acanthus Doctor

acrobatics.desc: When you are adjacent to the monster, you may spend <font class="kdm_font">c</font> to place your survivor on any other space adjacent to the monster.
acrobatics.name: Acrobatics

ageless_apprentice.desc:
When you gain Hunt XP, you may decide not to gain it.
When you depart, you may rotate up to 3 gear cards in your gear grid. This changes the location of their affinities and arrows. Otherwise, the gear functions normally.
ageless_apprentice.name: Ageless Apprentice

altered_destiny.desc: If you would gain a negative attribute token, gain a positive attribute token of that type instead.
altered_destiny.name: Altered Destiny

ambidexterous.name: Ambidexterous
ambidexterous.desc:
All melee weapons in your gear grid gain paired (add the speed of the second weapon when attacking with the first).
Ambidexterous cannot be used if there are any shields, two-handed or heavy gear in your gear grid.

armored_fist.name: Armored Fist
armored_fist.desc:
Requires Fist & Tooth Proficiency.
Your Fist & Tooth attacks gain strength equal to the current armor value of your arms hit location.

backstabber.name: Backstabber
backstabber.desc:
On a Perfect Hit with a dagger, your first wound attempt in that attack gains Devastating 1.
When you attack a monster with a dagger from its blind spot, if you have the Hoarder or Secretive disorder, increase the range of your Perfect hits by 1.

beast_of_caratosis.desc:
You may Concentrate. If you do, perform Beast of Caratosis at the start of your next act.
Beast of Caratosis: You reach into the dream and disappear in a shimmer of heat.
Place your survivor adjacent to the monster. For this attack, your attack speed is equal to your red affinities, you hit automatically, and you gain strength equal to double your red affinities. Then, gain +6 Hunt XP.
beast_of_caratosis.name: Beast of Caratosis

beetle_strength.desc:
Once per showdown, you may spend a to shove an adjacent obstacle terrain. If you do, move the train directly away from you in a straight line until it encounters a board edge or another obstacle terrain. Any monsters the train passes over suffer a wound, and any survivors it collides with suffer knockback 7.
The display of strength is so exhausting it ages you. You are knocked down and gain +1 Hunt XP.
beetle_strength.name: Beetle Strength

berserker.desc: Once per showdown, you may spend a to suffer bash and the frenzy brain trauma.
berserker.name: Berserker

black_guard_style.desc:
Swords in your gear grid gain Block 1.
When you block a hit with a sword, your next attack that round with a sword gains +2 accuracy, +2 strength, +2 speed. Limit, once per round.
During the settlement phase you may spend d to train a survivor. They gain the Black Guard Style secret fighting art. You lose it and suffer the broken arm severe injury.
black_guard_style.name: Black Guard Style

blotted_out.desc: When you suffer a brain trauma, gain a bleeding token.
blotted_out.name: Blotted Out

bone_whisperer.name: Bone Whisperer
bone_whisperer.desc:
When another survivor dies on the showdown board, place a token where they died. If you pass over it, remove the token and eat their skull. Heal your survivor and roll 1d10 + your Hunt XP:
1-3You feel amazing! Gain +1 permanent movement, speed and evasion.
4-8Gain +1 permanent strength.
9-18You gain a fighting art and +5 survival.
19+You run away into exile. At the end of the showdown, you are gone forever.

burning_ambition.desc: When you are instructed to Skip the Next Hunt, ignore it. The "Skip Next Hunt" box on your survivor record sheet cannot be filled in.
burning_ambition.name: Burning Ambition

burning_focus.desc: If you have 0 survival at the start of your act, gain 1 survival.
burning_focus.name: Burning Focus

carapace_of_will.desc:
At the start of the showdown, gain the Steadfast survivor status card.
When you are attacked, if you have 2+ steadfast tokens, ignore a hit and remove all your steadfast tokens.
carapace_of_will.name: Carapace of Will

champions_rite.desc:
Before making an attack, you may add your understanding to your accuracy attribute for that attack.
Limit, once per showdown.
champions_rite.name: Champion's Rite

clarity_of_darkness.desc:
At the start of the showdown, gain the Path of Gloom survivor status card.
There is a deadly, otherworldly presence about you. Other survivors cannot voluntarily end their movement adjacent to you.
clarity_of_darkness.name: Clarity of Darkness

clutch_fighter.desc: While you have 3 or more bleeding tokens, gain +1 strength and +1 accuracy.
clutch_fighter.name: Clutch Fighter

combo_master.desc: On a perfect hit, make 1 additional attack roll.
combo_master.name: Combo Master

convalescer.name: Convalescer
convalescer.desc:
Sympathy and tenderness elevate your care. Whenever you remove bleeding tokens, gain survival, or add armor points, increase this benefit by 1.
(e.g., if you use Bandages on another survivor, they remove up to 3 bleeding tokens.)
In contrast to your care, your attacks become more crude. They gain the club keyword.

courtly_screenwriter.desc: At the start of the showdown, secretly write down on a scrap of paper which survivors will live and who will deal the killing blow. During the aftermath, if your predictions were correct, raise the settlement's Survival Limit by 1.
courtly_screenwriter.name: Courtly Screenwriter

crossarm_block.desc: Whenever you are hit, after hit locations are rolled, you may change 1 result to the arms hit location.
crossarm_block.name: Crossarm Block

dark_manifestation.name: Dark Manifestation
dark_manifestation.desc:
Once per round, at the start of your act, you may spend the requisite insanity to perform one of the following abilities:
3Gain +2 strength until the end of the round.
6Perform Block 1.
13If adjacent to the monster, roll 1d10. On a 6+, you touch themonster, it suffers 1 wound.

death_touch.desc:
Gain +1 accuracy when attacking with Fist & Tooth.
When you wound a monster, it gains -1 toughness until the end of your attack.
You cannot use this if you are male.
death_touch.name: Death Touch

defender.desc:
When a survivor adjacent to you is knocked down, you may spend 1 survival. If you do, they stand and gain +1 survival from your words of encouragement.
You cannot use this if you have a broken jaw.
defender.name: Defender

double_dash.desc: During your act, once per round, you may spend <font class="kdm_font">a</font> to gain <font class="kdm_font">c</font>.
double_dash.name: Double Dash

eternal_will.desc:
Gain +1 accuracy and +1 strength for each permanent injury you have.
You may always depart, even when retired.
eternal_will.name: Eternal Will

ethereal_pact.name: Ethereal Pact
ethereal_pact.desc:
Add +3 to your brain trauma rolls.
When you suffer the Impossible! brain trauma, the fungus in your head connects to the dreaming. g Birth of a Savior and choose a dream. (If you've already reached Age 2, you cannot gain your dream's secret fighting art.)
If you are a Savior, this Fighting Art has no effect.

extra_sense.desc: You may dodge 1 additional time per round.
extra_sense.name: Extra Sense

fated_blow.desc: Once per showdown, you may give your next wound attempt +2 strength and Devastating 1.
fated_blow.name: Fated Blow

fencing.desc:
Ignore Parry when attempting to wound hit locations. (Attempt to wound these locations normally.)
When a monster attacks you, roll 1d10. On a 6+, ignore 1 hit. Limit, once per round.
fencing.name: Fencing

frozen_star.desc:
Once per round, you may spend 1 survival to freeze a monster's brain. They gain -2 accuracy until the end of the round.
Once per round, you may spend 1 survival to freeze a survivor's brain, killing them instantly. They die.
frozen_star.name: Frozen Star

giants_blood.name: Giant's Blood
giants_blood.desc:
You overproduce growth hormones! When you gain this fighting art, gain +1 strength, -1 evasion permanently.
You may consume skulls. If you do, gain the Marrow Hunger impairment.

grace_of_dormenatus.name: Grace of Dormenatus
grace_of_dormenatus.desc:
You may Concentrate. If you do, perform Grace of Dormenatus at the start of your next act.
Grace of Dormenatus: You reach into the dream and remove a twisting green crown. The crown explodes. A glittering rain of shards coats the survivors.
All survivors gain armor at all hit locations equal to your green affinities. They may remove up to the same number of tokens. Them, gain +6 Hunt XP. If you still exist, gain the priority target token.

harvestman.desc:
Gain +3 movement. Whenever you are knocked down, gain -1 movement token.
If you have the Tiny Arachnophobia disorder, you are too scared of spiders to imitate them and you cannot use this fighting art.
harvestman.name: Harvestman

headliner.desc: When you become doomed or gain the priority target token, you may choose to gain +1 survival or +1 strength token.
headliner.name: Headliner

hellfire.desc:
You cannot lose or remove this fighting art.
Gain +1 strength for each █ you have. You cannot be nominated for Intimacy. You ignore Extreme Heat.
At the start of your act, lose 1 survival. At the end of your act, if your survival is 0 or you have any +1 strength tokens, your organs cook themselves and you die.
hellfire.name: Hellfire

heroic.desc: Once per showdown, if you are standing adjacent to the monster and have 3+ survival, you may spend all of your survival for one automatic hit that inflicts a critical wound.
heroic.name: Heroic

immovable_object.desc: If you are on an unoccupied space, you stand firm in the face of any force. You cannot be knocked down and may ignore knockback. (If you occupy the same space as a monster, impassable terrain tile, or another survivor, you are knocked down and suffer knockback.)
immovable_object.name: Immovable Object

infernal_rhythm.name: Infernal Rhythm
infernal_rhythm.desc:
You may spend a to play an instrument in your gear grid. Reveal the next 3 monster hit locations, then put them back in any order.
Whenever you activate an instrument, gain a lantern token. At the start of another survivor's act, you may spend 5 lantern tokens to stir their blood. They gain c and a.

infinite_lives.name: Infinite Lives
infinite_lives.desc:
You can't create new memories.
You cannot gain new fighting arts or disorders. When you would gain one, instead gain a new lifetime! Give yourself a new name and a once per lifetime reroll. (Gain +1 survival for naming. Gain the reroll regardless of principle. Only 1 once per lifetime reroll at a time.)

king_of_a_thousand_battles.desc: Gain +2 Accuracy, +2 Strength, +2 Evasion. You may dodge any number of times in a round. Only 1 survivor may have this Secret Fighting Art.
king_of_a_thousand_battles.name: King of a Thousand Battles

kings_step.desc: Whenever you attack, you may discard any number of Battle Pressure hit locations drawn and draw an equal number of new hit locations. Whenever you attack, after drawing hit locations, but before rolling to wound, you may choose one hit location drawn and discard it to draw a new hit location. Traps will cancel these effects.
kings_step.name: King's Step

last_man_standing.desc: While you are the only survivor on the showdown board, you may not gain bleeding tokens or be knocked down.
last_man_standing.name: Last Man Standing

leader.desc:
Whenever you encourage a survivor, they gain +1 speed token until the end of the round.
Once per hunt phase, you may inspire another survivor. They use your understanding and courage to resolve a hunt or story event. (Example: if you have 3+ courage you can inspire another survivor to walk the path of the brave during Overwhelming Darkness.)
leader.name: Leader

legendary_lungs.desc: Once per attack, for each successful hit, make an additional attack roll.
legendary_lungs.name: Legendary Lungs

lucernaes_lantern.desc:
You may Concentrate. If you do, perform Lucernae's Lantern at the start of your next act.
Lucernae's Lantern: You reach into the dream and excise a screeching skull, darker than darkness. It hurtles at the monster.
Reveal hit locations equal to half your blue affinities (rounded down) one at a time. The mosnter suffers a critical wound at any locations with critical wound effects. (Ignore the effects of trap.) Then reshuffle the hit location deck. Gain +6 Hunt XP.
lucernaes_lantern.name: Lucernae's Lantern

lure_epilepsy.desc: Once per showdown, you may spend <font class="kdm_font">a</font> to give yourself a seizure. You suffer a random brain trauma and are knocked down.
lure_epilepsy.name: Lure Epilepsy

mammoth_hunting.desc: Gain +1 strength when attacking from adjacent spaces outside the monster's facing and blind spot.
mammoth_hunting.name: Mammoth Hunting

mighty_strike.desc: On a Perfect hit, gain +2 Strength until the end of the attack.
mighty_strike.name: Mighty Strike

monster_claw_style.desc: Your Fist & Tooth attacks gain +1 Accuracy, +1 Strength and Savage (after the first critical wound in an attack, savage weapons cause 1 additional wound. This rule does not trigger on Impervious hit locations).
monster_claw_style.name: Monster Claw Style

necromancer.desc:
When you depart, gain 1 to all hit locations for each gear card in your grid with the symbol keyword.
If you would roll on the severe injury table, roll on the Worm Trauma table on the other side of this card instead.
When you die or forget this, the settlement gains the Knowledge Worm innovation.
necromancer.name: Necromancer

orator_of_death.desc:
Once per showdown, you may spend a to have all non-deaf survivors gain +2 insanity.
When you die, you encourage all survivors with your last words.
orator_of_death.name: Orator of Death

otherworldly_luck.desc:
During the Hunt and Settlement phase, whenever you roll on a table, you may add +1 to the roll result. This may not exceed the highest possible result of that table.
(This includes Hunt Events, Story Events, Endeavors, Settlement Events, etc.)
otherworldly_luck.name: Otherworldly Luck

phantom_friend.desc:
The first time you gain a resource during a showdown, you may feed it to your phantom friend. If you do, archive the resources and gain +1 evasion token.
Lose this token if you are deaf or become deaf during the showdown.
phantom_friend.name: Phantom Friend

propulsion_drive.desc:
At the start of a showdown, gain the Momentum survivor status card.
When you attack, if you have 5+ momentum tokens, remove them all and roll 1d10. Gain that amount of luck and strength when attempting to wound the first selected hit location for this attack.
propulsion_drive.name: Propulsion Drive

purpose.desc:
Your comrades make you strong enough to exceed the limits of death itself.
During the showdown, if you would gain a lethal number of bleeding tokens while there are any other standing survivors, roll 1d10. On a 6+, you live but are knocked down. You will not bleed to death until you gain another bleeding token.
purpose.name: Purpose

red_fist.desc: At the start of each showdown, each survivor gains +1 Strength token. Survivors may spend +1 Strength tokens in place of survival.
red_fist.name: Red Fist

rhythm_chaser.desc:
On Arrival, gain +1 evasion token. When you are knocked down, if you don't have an instrument in your gear grid, remove all your +1 evasion tokens.
Rhythm Chaser cannot be used if there is any heavy gear in your grid.
rhythm_chaser.name: Rhythm Chaser

rolling_gait.name: Rolling Gait
rolling_gait.desc:
Spend a to notch an arrow. Your next attack with a bow ignores cumbersome.
At the end of your attack with a bow or arrow, if you hit the monster from outside its facing, it gains a flinch token.
Flinch token: When a monster with a flinch token attempts to perform e, cancele and discard this token.

ruthless.desc: Whenever a survivor dies during the showdown, roll 1d10. On a 7+, gain a Skull basic resource.
ruthless.name: Ruthless

scholar_of_death.desc:
On Arrival, gain reroll tokens equal to the number of volumes recorded about your quarry. (e.g. if your settlement has White Lion Volumes 1, 2, and 3 when you fight a White Lion, gain 3 reroll tokens.)
Discard a reroll token to reroll one of your roll results during the showdown. This includes monster roll results when you are the monster controller.
scholar_of_death.name: Scholar of Death

seasoned_hunter.desc:
Whenever a random hunt event result is:
11, 22, 33, 44, 55, 66, 77, 88, 99 or 100,
the event revealer gains +1 understanding and +1 courage.
seasoned_hunter.name: Seasoned Hunter

shielderang.name: Shielderang
shielderang.desc:
You are impervious behind your shield. IF you have a shield in your gear grid, ignore the first severe injury you suffer each showdown.
If you have Shield Specialization, shields in your gear grid gain Reach 3 and +1 strength for each level of Shield weapon proficiency you have beyond 3.

levels.1: You may spend <font class="kdm_font">a</font> while adjacent to another survivor to add <font class="inline_shield">2</font> to one of their hit locations.
levels.2: While all armor in your gear grid is silk and all jewelry is amber, gain +2 evasion.
levels.3: During the aftermath, roll 1d10 for each other survivor that died during the showdown. On a 7+, revive them.

sneak_attack.desc: When you attack a monster from its blind spot, gain +4 strength for that attack.
sneak_attack.name: Sneak Attack

stockist.name: Stockist
stockist.desc:
You may Concentrate. If you do, perform Stock Shot at the start of your next act.
Stock Shot: Activate a bow in your gear grid and attack the monster. For this attack, your bow's Range and strength are equal to the number of resources in the settlement storage. Limit once per showdown phase.

story_of_blood_1.name: Story of Blood 1
story_of_blood_1.desc:
At some point in your life, you learned a miraculous thing! You cannot recall who taught you or what it was. For a moment, you see a spectrum of colors in your blood. The first time you gain a bleeding token during the showdown, gain +1 survival.

Observation: When d is spent at Bloodletting or Sacrifice, gain +1 .

story_of_blood_2.name: Story of Blood 2
story_of_blood_2.desc:
You dream of your skin hardening and turning deep red. Your own image turns your stomach. Spend a to convert a bleeding token into scab armor. Add 1 to any hit location and suffer 1 brain damage.

Observation: When you use this while you have 4+ bleeding tokens, gain +1 .

story_of_blood_3.name: Story of Blood 3
story_of_blood_3.desc:
The red creature of your nightmares wears your skin and speaks of unending torment and eternal life. Spend a to convert a bleeding token into scab armor. Add 1 to any hit location.

Observation: When another survivor dies from bleeding tokens, gain +1 .

story_of_blood_4.name: Story of Blood 4
story_of_blood_4.desc:
You peel back the monster's skin to reveal a mass of blood with your likenesss. It hangs in the air briefly before collapsing and washing the wasteland red. Spend a to convert a bleeding token into scab armor. Add 1 to all hit locations. You may spend your bleeding tokens in place of survival.

Observation: When you use this, gain +1 .

strain_threshold.desc: You stress your heart. Roll 1d10. On a 6+, lose 1 . Otherwise, you have a heart attack and die.

strategist.desc: During the showdown setup, after placing terrain, you may add a Giant Stone Face or a Toppled Pillar terrain card to the showdown board.
strategist.name: Strategist

sun_eater.desc:
Your body mysteriously absorbs light. At the start of the showdown, gain survival up to the settlement's Survival Limit.
If you have any +1 strength tokens, you may spend them all to perform the Surge survival action (following all of its normal rules and restrictions).
sun_eater.name: Sun Eater

suppressed_shadow.desc:
You no longer cast a shadow and you never hesitate. Ignore First Strike.
On a Perfect Hit, your first wound attempt of the attack automatically succeeds and inflicts a critical wound.
If you die during the showdown, place a Shade minion in the space you occupied.
suppressed_shadow.name: Suppressed Shadow

sword_oath.name: Sword Oath
sword_oath.desc:
When you gain this, write the name of any sword gear on your record sheet. Note each time you wound with the named sword.
If you have wounded 18+ times with this sword, it gains Devastating 1 and Sentient while you have it equipped. When you suffer the flee brain trauma, lose this fighting art.

swordsmans_promise.desc: At the start of each showdown, gain survival up to your settlement's survival limit if you have a sword in your gear grid.
swordsmans_promise.name: Swordsman's Promise

synchronized_strike.desc:
With flawless coordination, you strike as one. When you're adjacent to a monster, attack with a melee weapon, and have an Attack Assist, your attack gains +1 Accuracy, +1 Strength. Limit, once per round.
Attack Assist: A survivor who also has Synchronized Strike and is in the right spot. They are standing adjacent to the monster, on its opposite side, and parallel to you.
synchronized_strike.name: Synchronized Strike

tenacious.desc:
When your wound attempt on a hit location is a failure, you may put that hit location back on top of the deck instead of in the discard pile.
Limit, once per round.
tenacious.name: Tenacious

thrill_seeker.desc: Whenever you gain survival during the showdown phase, gain 1 additional survival.
thrill_seeker.name: Thrill Seeker

timeless_eye.desc:
Your attack roll is a perfect hit on a result of a 9 or 10.
You cannot use Timeless Eye if you have the blind severe head injury.
timeless_eye.name: Timeless Eye

tough.desc: When rolling on a severe injury table, unless you roll a 1, add +1 to the result. (This does not include brain trauma. The result total cannot exceed 10.)
tough.name: Tough

trailblazer.desc:
The hunting party may start the hunt phase 1 space closer to the monster.
At the start of the showdown, all survivors gain +1 survival and up to +1 insanity.
trailblazer.name: Trailblazer

transcended_masochist.desc:
When you gain a bleeding token, gain +1 survival and +1 insanity.
Ignore the effects of the Aichmophobia and Apathetic disorders.
transcended_masochist.name: Transcended Masochist

trick_attack.desc: Once per showdown, when you wound a monster from its blind spot, a survivor adjacent to you may gain the priority target token.
trick_attack.name: Trick Attack

true_blade.desc:
All swords in your gear grid gain deadly.
Gain +3 luck when attacking with a sword if you have the Ghostly Beauty and Narcissistic disorders.
true_blade.name: True Blade

tumble.desc: When something would collide with you, roll 1d10. On a result of 6+, you successfully tumble out of harm's way. Instead, place your survivor standing on the closest free space outside of the collision path.
tumble.name: Tumble

unbreakable.desc: Once per lantern year, you may ignore one of your severe injury roll results. If you do, gain a random disorder.
unbreakable.name: Unbreakable

unconscious_fighter.desc: It takes 7 bleeding tokens to kill you.
unconscious_fighter.name: Unconscious Fighter

unrelenting.desc: If all of your attack rolls in an attack miss, you may spend 1 survival to re-roll all attack rolls.
unrelenting.name: Unrelenting

vengeance.desc: When a survivor dies during the showdown, gain +4 survival and +1 strength token.
vengeance.name: Vengeance

wardrobe_expert.desc: When you suffer a severe injury at a hit location, you may archive a gear worn at that location to ignore it and gain +1 survival.
wardrobe_expert.name: Wardrobe Expert

zero_presence.desc: Gain +1 Strength when attacking a monster from its blind spot. Whenever you attack a monster, you are always considered to be in its blind spot.
zero_presence.name: Zero Presence

acid_tooth_dagger.name: Acid-Tooth Dagger
acid_tooth_dagger.desc: On a Perfect hit, a wound attempt in your attack automatically succeeds.

adventure_sword.name: Adventure Sword
adventure_sword.desc: Your courage is added to this weapon's strength.

afterdeath_brew.name: Afterdeath Brew
afterdeath_brew.desc:
a: You consume this and gain 5 bleeding tokens.
During the Aftermath, roll 1d10 for each survivor that died from bleeding tokens. On a 9+, the brew saves their life but makes them deaf.

crafting_process: Boil mixture over heat to remove invasive microbes.
Knead pottery clay to create a cask. Bake, then glaze interior with Love Juice.
Set aside oily residue during skimming. Let cool until waxy then shape to create seal.

almanac.name: Almanac
almanac.desc:
When you depart, gain +2 insanity.
You cannot gain disorders.

amber_edge.name: Amber Edge
amber_edge.desc: At the end of each attack, if you wounded the monster, make an additional attack with this weapon.

amber_poleaxe.name: Amber Poleaxe
amber_poleaxe.desc: When a monster collides with you, roll 1d10. On a 6+, the monster suffers one wound.

ancient_lion_claws.name: Ancient Lion Claws
ancient_lion_claws.desc: +2 strength while attacking with daggers or katars. You may move up to 2 additional spaces when you pounce.

ancient_root.name: Ancient Root
ancient_root.desc: When you are picked as a target while insane, the carrot shrieks fearfully. Roll 1d10. On a 1, the shrill sound stuns you. You are doomed for the rest of the monster's action. On a 6+, the harsh note alerts you. Ignore the first hit of the monster's attack.

recipes.prefix_text: During g Black Harvest, if the Gatherer is insane, they follow a shrill echo in the darkness. A Fleshy stalk quivers in the ground, its muffled shrieking begs to be uprooted. Gain the Ancient Root rare gear.

apostle_crown.name: Apostle Crown
apostle_crown.desc: At the start of your act, if you have any +1 strength tokens, reveal the next 4 monster hit locations and put them back in any order.

arc_bow.name: Arc Bow
arc_bow.desc: Cumbersome: Spend c as an additional cost of activating this weapon.

affinity_bonus.desc: Range +2

arm_of_the_first_tree.name: Arm of the First Tree
arm_of_the_first_tree.desc: On a Perfect Hit, the monster gains -1 toughness token until the end of the round. A monster can only suffer this once per round.
arm_of_the_first_tree.selector_text: Arm of the First Tree (Beta Challenge Scenarios)
