armor_spikes.name: Armor Spikes
armor_spikes.desc: If adjacent to the monster when you suffer a severe body injury, the monster suffers a wound. Limit, once per round.

bandages.name: Bandages
bandages.desc: <font class="kdm_font">a</font>: Remove up to 2 bleeding tokens from yourself or an adjacent survivor.

beacon_shield.name: Beacon Shield
beacon_shield.desc:
Add 2 to all hit locations.
Block 2: Spend a to ignore 2 hits the next time you are attacked. Lasts until your next act. You cannot use block more than once per attack.

beast_knuckle.name: Beast Knuckle
beast_knuckle.desc: When you wound with this weapon, monster gains -1 toughness until end of the attack.

belt_of_gender_swap.name: Belt of Gender Swap
belt_of_gender_swap.desc: While in your gear grid, change to the opposite sex.

bird_bread.name: Bird Bread
bird_bread.desc: a Consume: Once per showdown, add 1 to all hit locations. Gain priority target token. Roll 1d10. On a 1, reduce your survival to 0.

black_friday_lantern.desc: On Arrival (at the start of the showdown), you may archive this and ambush the monster. limit, once per campaign.
black_friday_lantern.name: Black Friday Lantern

footnote.desc: This gains +10 strength when attacking a monster with 10+ toughness.

affinity_bonus.desc: Gains Deflect 1

crafting_process: Boil Nightmare Corn in Dark Water over Heat to create syrup infused with paranoia.
Isolate a survivor with +10 insanity in a hovel with the dagger. Their deranged outbursts will chip the dagger, revealing its final shape.
A survivor with Blotted Out consumes the syrup. Their inevitable regurgitation of of syrup and fearful bile is used to patinate the weapon.

black_sword.name: Black Sword
black_sword.desc: On a Perfect hit, gain +1 survival. If you are a Sword Master, you understand this weapon's potential. It gains +20 strength.

blast_shield.name: Blast Shield
blast_shield.desc:
Add 1 to all hit locations.
Block 1. The first time you block a hit each showdown, gain the priority target token.

blast_sword.name: Blast Sword
blast_sword.desc: When you spend <font class="kdm_font">a</font> to block with this weapon, gain +1 survival.

blood_paint.name: Blood Paint
blood_paint.desc: <font class="kdm_font">a</font>: Activate weapon gear to the left and right of this card. These are two separate attacks. Cannot be used with two-handed weapons.

blood_plasma_gun.name: Blood Plasma Gun
blood_plasma_gun.desc: When you activate this, gain 1 bleeding token. X = your bleeding tokens. Z = X + X + X + X + X

blood_plasma_katana.name: Blood Plasma Katana
blood_plasma_katana.desc: When you activate this, gain 1 bleeding token. X = your bleeding tokens minus 2.

blood_sheath.name: Blood Sheath
blood_sheath.desc: When Rainbow Katana is left of Blood Sheath, it loses Frail and gains Sharp (add 1d10 strength to each wound attempt).

bloodskin.name: Bloodskin
bloodskin.desc: When you depart, you fill the bloodskin and gain 2 bleeding tokens. At the start of each of each of your acts, remove 1 bleeding token.

affinity_bonus.desc: When you are picked as a target, roll 1d10. On a 6+, the monster must pick a new target, if possible.
Unshakeable: When you draw a Trap, roll 1d10. On a 6+, discard the Trap and reshuffle the deck.

blue_lantern.name: Blue Lantern
blue_lantern.desc: <font class="kdm_font">a</font>: Suffer 2d10 brain damage and reveal HL cards until you reveal the the trap. Put them back in the same order. Limit, once per showdown.

blue_power_core.name: Blue Power Core
blue_power_core.desc: All nuclear gear cards in your gear grid gain Deadly 2.

affinity_bonus.desc: If you are the monster controller when the monster draws <font class="kdm_font_10">b</font>, draw 1 extra card. Select 1 to play and discard the other.

bone_axe.name: Bone Axe
bone_axe.desc: Savage: Once per attack, if you critically wound, cause 1 additional wound. This effect does not apply to impervious hit locations.

bone_blade.name: Bone Blade
bone_blade.desc:
Frail: When you attempt to wound a super-dense hit location, this weapon breaks.
Archive this card at the end of the attack.

bone_club.name: Bone Club
bone_club.desc: Cumbersome: Spend c as an additional cost to activate this weapon. Ignore Cumbersome if this weapon is activated indirectly (Pounce, Charge, etc.).

bone_dagger.name: Bone Dagger
bone_dagger.desc:
On a Perfect hit, gain +1 survival.
Perfect Hit: An attack roll result of a lantern 10.

bone_darts.name: Bone Darts
bone_darts.desc: Frail: When you attempt to wound a super-dense hit location, this weapon breaks. Archive this card at the end of the attack.

bone_earrings.name: Bone Earrings
bone_earrings.desc: At the start of the showdown, gain +2 speed and +2 strength tokens if insane and all gear in your gear grid has the bone keyword.

bone_pickaxe.name: Bone Pickaxe
bone_pickaxe.desc: After Hunt phase setup, place the Mineral Gathering event on any hunt space.

bone_sickle.name: Bone Sickle
bone_sickle.desc: After Hunt phase setup, place the Herb Gathering event on any hunt space.

affinity_bonus.desc: At the start of your act, you may spend 3 insanity to gain 1 survival or 1 survival to gain 3 insanity.

boss_mehndi.name: Boss Mehndi
boss_mehndi.desc: Boss is brave. While adjacent to you, insane survivors gain +1 speed.

brain_mint.name: Brain Mint
brain_mint.desc: a Consume: Remove all your tokens and stand up. You may use this while knocked down. Use once per showdown.

brave_dirndl.name: Brave Dirndl
brave_dirndl.desc: Once per lifetime, when you are a returning survivor and this is the only armor you are wearing, gain +1 courage. If your settlement has Song of the Brave, gain +1 permanent strength too!

crafting_process: Hear gleeful music of a returning survivor with an instrument to inspire design.
Reclaim hardware from Skullcap Hammer for motions used throughout ensemble.
Use Bone Sickle to properly size choker and armlet accessories.

brazen_bat.name: Brazen Bat
brazen_bat.desc:
Gains Sharp when attacking 🎃 monsters.
If you are not wearing any head armor, you feel a spirit of rebellion! You may ignore the first e during your first attack each round.

crafting_process: Create a lathe with spare bones. A survivor with Rhythm Chaser cranks it.
Use Scrap Smelting to heat lantern shards and place in a pile.
Crush Dried Acanthus and mix with urine to create a sealant.

bug_trap.name: Bug Trap
bug_trap.desc: At the start of the showdown, roll 1d10. On a 3+, add a Bug Patch terrain card to the showdown board.

butcher_cleaver.name: Butcher Cleaver
butcher_cleaver.desc:
Sentient: Must be insane to activate.
Irreplaceable: When you die, archive this card.

affinity_bonus.desc: For every 10 insanity you have, gain +1 speed and +1 strength.

calcified_digging_claw.name: Calcified Digging Claw

scouts_tunic.desc: Takes the place of the Leather Mask and Leather Cuirass for completing the leather armor set.

scrap_dagger.name: Scrap Dagger
scrap_dagger.desc: On a Perfect hit, the edge sharpens. Gain +2 strength for the rest of the attack.

scrap_shield.name: Scrap Shield
scrap_shield.desc:
Add 1 to all hit locations.
Block 1: Spend a to ignore 1 hit the next time you are attacked. Lasts until your next act. You cannot use block more than once per attack.

scrap_sword.name: Scrap Sword
scrap_sword.desc: On a Perfect hit, the edge sharpens. Gain +4 strength for the rest of the attack.

affinity_bonus.desc: Gains Deadly.

screaming_armor_set.name: Screaming Armor Set
screaming_armor_set.desc:
Add 2 to all hit locations.
Skewer: After you slam, spend a to move 1 space and activate a melee weapon with +2 strength. If you wound with a spear, apply that wound roll result to the next selected hit location this attack.

screaming_bracers.name: Screaming Bracers
screaming_bracers.desc: On Arrival, if possible, add an Acanthus Plant terrain card to the showdown. When you activate terrain, you may add +2 to your roll result.

screaming_coat.name: Screaming Coat
screaming_coat.desc: Slam: Spend c to full move forward in a straight line. If you move 4+ spaces and stop adjacent to a monster, it suffers knockback 1 and -1 toughness until the end of the round.

screaming_horns.name: Screaming Horns
screaming_horns.desc: a: Scream. Non-deaf insane survivors gain +1 movement until end of round. All other survivors gain +1 insanity.

screaming_leg_warmers.name: Screaming Leg Warmers
screaming_leg_warmers.desc: On Arrival your feet hurt. Gain +3 insanity.

screaming_skirt.name: Screaming Skirt
screaming_skirt.desc: Thick, protective fur protects your parts. Add +1 to severe waist injury roll results.

affinity_bonus.desc: a Consume: Gain +3 survival and +1 strength token. Limit, once per showdown.

shadow_saliva_shawl.name: Shadow Saliva Shawl

affinity_bonus.desc: +1 Evasion. All weapons gain slow

shadow_saliva_shawl.desc: Cannot ear if you have heavy, soluble, or shield gear, or any gear with <font class="inline_shield">3</font> or higher printed on it.

shielded_quiver.name: Shielded Quiver
shielded_quiver.desc: You may activate and gain the benefits of each arrow gear in your grid one additional time each showdown.

silk_armor_set.name: Silk Armor Set
silk_armor_set.desc:
Add 1 to all hit locations.
Whenever you are attacked, after hit locations are rolled, you may change 1 hit location dice to the result of your choice.

silk_body_suit.name: Silk Body Suit
silk_body_suit.desc: Reduce damage from every hit suffered by 2, to a minimum of 1. You may not have any heavy or metal armor in your gear grid.

silk_bomb.name: Silk Bomb
silk_bomb.desc: <font class="kdm_font">a</font>: Until the end of the round, all survivors ignore knockback and bash. Archive after use.

affinity_bonus.desc: +1 movement. Once per round, you may spend 1 survival to gain 2 insanity.
<font class="kdm_font">a</font>: add <font class="inline_shield">1</font> to all hit locations. Use once per showdown.
<font class="kdm_font">a</font>: add <font class="inline_shield">1</font> to all hit locations. Use once per showdown.
<font class="kdm_font">a</font>: Turn the monster to face away from you. Use only during the survivors' turn.
On a Perfect hit, you may archive a mood in play instead of drawing a hit location.

skleaver.name: Skleaver
skleaver.desc: On the first Perfect hit each attack, this gains devastating 1 until the end of the attack.

affinity_bonus.desc: Loses the heavy keyword

skull_helm.name: Skull Helm
skull_helm.desc: When you suffer a severe head injury, the Skull Helm is destroyed. Archive this card.

skullcap_hammer.name: Skullcap Hammer
skullcap_hammer.desc: On a Perfect Hit, the monster is dazed, and gains -1 speed token until the end of its turn. A monster can be dazed once per round.

sky_harpoon.name: Sky Harpoon
sky_harpoon.desc: Once per showdown, if monster is in reach, roll 1d10. On a 6+, you skewer it! It suffers 1 wound. Move it up to 3 spaces towards you.

sleeping_virus_flower.name: Sleeping Virus Flower
sleeping_virus_flower.desc: When you die, a flower bloomes from your corpse. Add g A Warm Virus to the timeline next year. You are the guest.

affinity_bonus.desc: Monsters and survivors adjacent to you have -1 luck.

sonic_tomahawk.name: Sonic Tomahawk
sonic_tomahawk.desc: On a perfect hit, make 1 additional attack roll.

affinity_bonus.desc: Gain Savage and Paired
While insane, and not wearing armor or accessories, gain +2 evasion, +2 strength.

speed_powder.name: Speed Powder
speed_powder.desc: <font class="kdm_font">a</font>: Suffer 2 brain damage. Gain +1 speed token. Use once per showdown.

steadfast_potion.name: Steadfast Potion
steadfast_potion.desc: When you ignore a hit with Block, gain +1 strength token. When you are knocked down, lose all your +1 strength tokens.

steel_shield.name: Steel Shield
steel_shield.desc:
-3 movement.
Spend a or survival to ignore a hit.

steel_sword.name: Steel Sword
steel_sword.desc: On a Perfect hit, the edge sharpens. Gain +1d10 strength for the rest of the attack.

stone_noses.name: Stone Noses
stone_noses.desc:
On Arrival, gain +1 survival, +1 insanity.
Arrival: At the start of the showdown.

sun_lure_and_hook.name: Sun Lure and Hook
sun_lure_and_hook.desc: When you depart, gain +1 survival. After Hunt Phase setup, place the Sky Fishing event on any space.

affinity_bonus.desc: On a Perfect hit, do not draw a hit location. Monster suffers 1 wound.

sunshark_arrows.name: Sunshark Arrows
sunshark_arrows.desc: Activation Limit 3: May activate this up to 3 times per showdown (use tokens to track).

affinity_bonus.desc: Gains +4 strength and <b>slow</>.

sunspot_dart.name: Sunspot Dart
sunspot_dart.desc: When you hit, there is an inspiring flash! Survivors adjacent to the monster gain +1 survival.

sunspot_lantern.name: Sunspot Lantern
sunspot_lantern.desc: You cast a 1 space shadow directly away from the monster. If the shadow can be cast in two spaces, decide which space has it until you move.

sword_of_silence.name: Sword of Silence
sword_of_silence.desc: Gains Sharp if you have 5+ understanding. While your settlement has this sword, ignore g White Secret and g White Speaker.

tabard.name: Tabard
tabard.desc: When you are encouraged, gain +1 insanity if your settlement is Barbaric or gain +1 survival if your settlement is Romantic.

talon_knife.name: Talon Knife
talon_knife.desc: If all of your attack rolls hit, gain Savage and Deadly until the end of your attack.

teleric_eye_tac.name: Teleric Eye Tac
teleric_eye_tac.desc: <font class="kdm_font">a</font>: Roll 3 hit location dice and note the results. The next time you are hit, use one of these results. (Discard the remaining noted results.)

crafting_process: Spin Circlet on Lion Tail until lens comes free. Invert the lens and replace in Circlet.
Melt Golden Whiskers with Heat to form focal point beads to hang on back.
Soak the work in Ammonia to provide rigidity and give color.

tempered_axe.name: Tempered Axe
tempered_axe.desc: When you use Axe Specialization, your second attempt to wound the selected hit location gains Sharp.

crafting_process: Hollow out Bone Axe by soaking in Ammonia and scraping with bone tools.
Combine marrow and scrap into a steaming slurry using Scrap Smelting. Beware of fumes.
Coat entire axe with steaming slurry and fill hollow head with scrap for heft.

tempered_dagger.name: Tempered Dagger
tempered_dagger.desc: While using Dagger Specialization, you may discard all other drawn hit locations to gain that much luck for your second attempt to wound that hit location.

crafting_process: Consult a disgruntled aesthete complaining about Scrap Dagger design.
Combine marrow and scrap into a steaming slurry using Scrap Smelting. Beware of fumes.
Soften Scrap Dagger in slurry and fully reform. Sharpen with Founding Stone.

affinity_bonus.desc: Add +1 to your Spear Specialization roll results with this weapon

crafting_process: Drive a pointed bone into the tang of the Scrap Sword, splintering it.
Combine marrow and scrap into a steaming slurry using Scrap Smelting. Beware of fumes.
Use steaming slurry and Bone Club to reform sword into a multi-pointed blade.

the_beetle_bomb.name: The Beetle Bomb
the_beetle_bomb.desc: a: If adjacent to the monster, roll 1d10. On a 6+, the monster gains -1 accuracy and -1 evasion tokens. Limit, once per showdown.

the_weaver.name: The Weaver
the_weaver.desc: When you wound a monster, add <font class="inline_shield">1</font> to a random hit location.

throwing_knife.name: Throwing Knife
throwing_knife.desc: At the end of your attack, gain +1 accuracy token for each Perfect hit. When knocked down, remove all your +1 accuracy tokens.

thunder_maul.name: Thunder Maul
thunder_maul.desc: On a Perfect hit, the monster is knocked down. Suffer a severe arm injury. All non-deaf survivors suffer 1 brain damage.

tool_belt.name: Tool Belt
tool_belt.desc:
If you have no weapons in your gear grid, gain +3 evasion.
Tools in your gear grid lose frail. Tools with attack profiles gain +1 speed, +3 accuracy and sharp.

trash_crown.name: Trash Crown
trash_crown.desc: a: Reveal the next 4 hit location cards and discard 3 that are not traps. Place remaining cards on top of the deck in any order.

twilight_revolver.name: Twilight Revolver
twilight_revolver.desc: c a and 1 survival: Make an attack using this weapon. This attack has Range 3 and gains -2 Accuracy, +5 speed. Ignore e WOUND for this attack. Limit, once per showdown.

twilight_sword.name: Twilight Sword
twilight_sword.desc:
Gains Devastating 2 when fighting the Watcher.
* Accuracy is 9 - Twilight Sword proficiency level.

twilight_thong.name: Twilight Thong
twilight_thong.desc: Its fabric responds to you; stress causes INTENSE constriction. Do not suffer brain traumas (ignore this if you have destroyed genitals).

vault_key_earrings.name: Vault Key Earrings
vault_key_earrings.desc: While you have this in your gear grid, choose one of your disorders and ignore its effects.

crafting_process: Consult with a survior that has Fear of the Dark to understand the key's shape.
Heat and fold the Broken Lantern innards to shape a key that unlocks the mind.
Brush thin coats of Cyclops Fly paste with fur armor bristles.

vespertine_arrow.name: Vespertine Arrow
vespertine_arrow.desc: Archive after use. If your attack misses, place a Flower Patch terrain tile adjacent to the monster.

vespertine_bow.name: Vespertine Bow
vespertine_bow.desc: Before each attack, you may choose for Vespertine Bow to have slow, +4 accuracy, and Range: 9 for that attack.

vespertine_cello.name: Vespertine Cello
vespertine_cello.desc: At start of showdown, all other survivors with an instrument in their gear grid gain +1 luck token.

vespertine_foil.name: Vespertine Foil
vespertine_foil.desc: At the beginning of each settlement phase, archive this unless you spend 1 Flower resource.

affinity_bonus.desc: Gains deadly 2.

vibrant_lantern.name: Vibrant Lantern
vibrant_lantern.desc: You may archive this to gain 1 Broken Lantern basic resource and 1 survival.

vixen_tail.name: Vixen Tail
vixen_tail.desc: The bushy tail heightens your awareness. If you are insane, you cannot be ambushed.

crafting_process: Retrieve the fur baby blanket saved from 🔖 Infant Adrift.
Use a Crab Spider to eat vicious mites that have burrowed in the fur blanket.
Comb and fluff fur, then lightly oil with Monster Grease.

whisker_harp.name: Whisker Harp
whisker_harp.desc:
On Arrival, all survivors gain +1 survival.
a: Strum, roll 1d10. On a result of 6+ discard 1 mood currently in play.

whistling_mace.name: Whistling Mace
whistling_mace.desc:
On a Perfect hit, reveal the next AI card. Place it on top or bottom of the AI deck.
Unwieldy: If any attack roll results are 1, you hit yourself and suffer 1 damage.

affinity_bonus.desc: When you Sideswipe, gain +1 accuracy and +5 strength for your attack next this turn

white_lion_armor_set.name: White Lion Armor Set
white_lion_armor_set.desc:
Add 1 to all hit locations.
Your weapons are your claws! Gain +1 speed and +2 strength when attacking with daggers or katars.

affinity_bonus.desc: +1 movement

white_lion_coat.name: White Lion Coat
white_lion_coat.desc: Pounce: Spend c and a to move 3 spaces in a straight line. Then, if you moved 3 spaces, activate a melee weapon with +1 strength.

white_lion_gauntlets.name: White Lion Gauntlet
white_lion_gauntlets.desc: When you Pounce, gain +1 accuracy for your next attack this turn.

affinity_bonus.desc: a and 1 survival: Roar. Non-Deaf Insane survivors gain +2 strength until end of round. All other survivors gain +1 insanity.
Play the showdown with the top card of the hit location deck revealed.

xmaxe.name: Xmaxe
xmaxe.desc: This weapon's strength is equal to your current insanity.

affinity_bonus.desc: Gains Devastating 1: Whenever you wound, inflict 1 additional wound.

accept_darkness.name: Accept Darkness
accept_darkness.survivor_buff: Add +2 to all Brain Trauma Rolls.
accept_darkness.desc:
The settlement no longer fears the darkness. Letting go means your resolve cannot be cracked.
Add +2 to all Brain Trauma rolls.

ammonia.name: Ammonia
ammonia.desc:
A pungent, bilious substance ideal for crafting leather and treating wounds.
Departing survivors gain +1 survival.

barbaric.name: Barbaric
barbaric.survivor_buff: All current and newborn survivors gain +1 permanent Strength.
barbaric.desc:
Believe in the power of human strength to overpower any obstacle.
All current and newborn survivors gain +1 permanent strength.

bloodline.name: Bloodline
bloodline.survivor_buff:
Newborn survivors inherit the following from their parents:
  • The Oracle's Eye, Iridescent Hide, or Pristine ability (choose 1)
  • 1 Surname
  • Half of one parent's weapon proficiency levels (rounded up)

cannibalize.name: Cannibalize
cannibalize.settlement_buff: Whenever a survivor dies, draw 1 basic resource and add it to the settlement storage. Do not gain a resource if a survivor is lost, ceases to exist, or is exiled.
cannibalize.desc: Whenever a survivor dies, draw 1 basic resource and add it to the settlement storage. Do not gain a resource if a survivor is lost, ceases to exist, or is exiled.

clan_of_death.name: Clan of Death
clan_of_death.survivor_buff: All newborn survivors gain +1 Accuracy, +1 Strength and +1 Evasion.

collective_toil.name: Collective Toil
settlement_buff: At the start of the settlement phase, gain +1 Endeavor for every 10 population.
collective_toil.desc:
Your settlement leans into the storm. If everyone holds strong, you will triumph.
At the start of the settlement phase, gain +1d for every 10 population.

cooking.name: Cooking
cooking.settlement_buff: +1 <font class="kdm_font">d</font> (At the start of the Settlement Phase, gain +1 endeavor.)

crimson_candy.name: Crimson Candy
crimson_candy.survivor_buff: At the start of the showdown, each survivor gains ★ survival.

empire.name: Empire
empire.survivor_buff: Newborn survivors are born with +1 permanent strength and the <font class="maroon_text">Pristine</font> ability.

family.name: Family
family.desc:
Departing survivors gain +1 survival.
Survivors nominated for Intimacy may give themselves a surname if they do not have one.
A newborn survivor inherits the surname of one parent, their weapon type and half (rounded down) of their weapon proficiency levels.
family.settlement_buff: Survivors nominated for intimacy may give themselves a surname if they do not have one. A newborn survivor inherits the surname of one parent, their weapon type and half (rounded down) of their weapon proficiency levels.

filleting_table.name: Filleting Table
filleting_table.settlement_buff: Once per settlement phase, if the returning survivors are victorious, gain 1 random basic resource.

final_fighting_art.name: Final Fighting Art
final_fighting_art.settlement_buff: Once per showdown, you may select a card from the discard pile or wound stack and place it on top of the AI deck.

forbidden_dance.name: Forbidden Dance
forbidden_dance.survivor_buff: When a survivor uses the Synchronized Strike secret fighting art, reroll missed attack rolls once.

graves.name: Graves
graves.settlement_buff:
All new survivors gain +1 understanding.
When a survivor dies during the hunt or showdown phase, gain +2 d.
When a survivor dies during the settlement phase, gain +1 d.
graves.desc:
All new survivors gain +1 understanding.
When a survivor dies during the hunt or showdown phase, gain +2 d.
When a survivor dies during the settlement phase, gain +1 d.

guidepost.name: Guidepost
guidepost.desc:
The soft glow of its light fills the survivors with a sense of security. Departing survivors gain +1 survival.
d: The survivor attempts to pull the weapon free from the ground. Roll 1d10 and add their strength. If the result is 12+, gain the Lantern Halberd rare gear and lose this innovation (Archive this card).

heart_flute.name: Heart Flute
heart_flute.survivor_buff: When a survivor uses the Synchronized Strike fighting art, their attack assist may spend 1 survival to change any monster e to a e FAILURE before any wound attempts are made. Limit, once per attack.

hovel.name: Hovel
hovel.desc:
The settlement accepts this nightmarish landscape as their home.
Departing survivors gain +1 survival.

lantern_oven.name: Lantern Oven
lantern_oven.desc:
By agitating lanterns, a source of Heat becomes available to the settlement.
Departing survivors gain +1 survival.

legless_ball.name: Legless Ball
legless_ball.subhead: Spend only 1 <font class="kdm_font">d</font> here per settlement phase.

mastery_axe.name: Mastery - Axe
mastery_axe.desc: When an Axe Master wounds a monster with an axe at a location with a persistent injury, that wound becomes a critical wound.

mastery_bow.name: Mastery - Bow
mastery_bow.desc: If you are a Bow Master, all bows in your gear grid gain Deadly 2. In addition, ignore cumbersome on all Bows.

mastery_club.name: Mastery - Club
mastery_club.desc: When a Club Master attacks with a club, if a successful wound attempt total is greater than or equal to twice the monster's toughness, inflict an additional wound.

mastery_dagger.name: Mastery - Dagger
mastery_dagger.desc: After a wounded hit location is discarded, a Dagger Master who is adjacent to the attacker and the wounded monster may spend 1 survival to re-draw the wounded hit location and attempt to wound with a dagger. Treat monster reactions on the re-drawn hit location card normally.

mastery_fist_and_tooth.name: Mastery - Fist & Tooth
mastery_fist_and_tooth.desc: While a survivor is a Fist & Tooth Master, they gain +2 permanent accuracy and +2 permanent strength (they receive this bonus even when not attacking with Fist and Tooth).

mastery_grand_weapon.name: Mastery - Grand Weapon
mastery_grand_weapon.desc: When a Grand Weapon Master perfectly hits with a grand weapon, cancel all reactions for that attack.

mastery_katana.name: Mastery - Katana
mastery_katana.desc:
When a survivor reaches Katana Mastery, they leave the settlement forever, heeding the call of the storm to hone their art.
Before the master leaves, you may nominate a survivor. Set that survivor's weapon type to Katana and their weapon proficiency level to 1.

mastery_katar.name: Mastery - Katar
mastery_katar.desc: If you are a Katar Master, gain a +1 evasion token on a perfect hit with a katar. When you are knocked down, remove all +1 evasion tokens.

mastery_scythe.name: Mastery - Scythe
mastery_scythe.desc:
When you critically wound with a scythe, roll 1d10. On a 6+, shuffle the hit location deck (do not shuffle unresolved hit locations).
Limit, once per round.

mastery_shield.name: Mastery - Shield
mastery_shield.desc: When a Shield Master is adjacent to a survivor that is targeted by a monster, they may swap spaces on the board with the survivor and become the target instead. The master must have a shield to perform this.

mastery_spear.name: Mastery - Spear
mastery_spear.desc: Whenever a Spear Master hits a monster with a Separ, they may spend 1 survival to gain the Priority Target token. If they made the hit from directly behind another survivor, that survivor gains the Priority Target token instead.

mastery_sword.name: Mastery - Sword
mastery_sword.desc: A Sword master gains +1 accuracy, +1 strength, and +1 speed when attacking with a Sword.

mastery_twilight_sword.name: Mastery - Twilight Sword
mastery_twilight_sword.desc: Any Survivor who attains Twilight Sword Mastery leaves the settlement forever in pursuit of a higher purpose. Remove them from the settlement's population. You may place the master's Twilight Sword in another survivor's gear grid or archive it.

mastery_whip.name: Mastery - Whip
mastery_whip.desc: Whip Masters gain +5 strength when attacking with a Whip.

partnership.name: Partnership
partnership.desc: When you both Arrive, gain survival up to the survival limit. Partners may only nominate each other for g Intimacy. When a partner dies, the remaining partner gains a random disorder and loses this ability.

pictograph.name: Pictograph
pictograph.survivor_buff:
At the start of a standing survivor's act, they may decide to skip their act and g Run Away.
After a hunt is resolved, a survivor may decide it's time to go home and g Run Away.

protect_the_young.name: Protect the Young
protect_the_young.settlement_buff: When rolling on the Intimacy story event, roll twice and pick one result.
protect_the_young.desc:
The children are the future.
When rolling on the Intimacy story event, roll twice and pick 1 result.

radiating_orb.name: Radiating Orb
radiating_orb.settlement_buff:
Departing Survivors and newborn survivors gain +1 survival.
Departing survivors with a constellation gain +1 survival.
radiating_orb.desc:
Departing Survivors and newborn survivors gain +1 survival.
Departing survivors with a constellation gain +1 survival.

romantic.name: Romantic
romantic.survivor_buff: When you gain a random fighting art, draw 3 fighting art cards and select 1 to keep.
romantic.desc:
Believe in the potential for beauty, decency, and ingenuity in others.
When you gain a random fighting art, draw 3 fighting art cards and select 1 to keep.

saga.name: Saga
saga.settlement_buff:
A telling of the settlement's survival set to a soft rhythmic beating of drums.
All newborn survivors gain: +2 Courage, +2 Understanding, +2 Hunt XP.

sauna_shrine.name: Sauna Shrine
sauna_shrine.departure_buff: When survivors depart for a Nemesis Encounter or Special Showdown, they gain +10 survival.
sauna_shrine.desc: When survivors depart for a Nemesis Encounter or Special Showdown, they gain +10 survival.

settlement_watch.name: Settlement Watch
settlement_watch.survivor_buff: Departing Survivors gain +2 survival when they depart for a Nemesis Encounter or a Special Showdown.
settlement_watch.desc: Departing Survivors gain +2 survival when they depart for a Nemesis Encounter or a Special Showdown.

song_of_the_brave.name: Song of the Brave
song_of_the_brave.survivor_buff:
The survivors lift their voices into the darkness. On arrival, each non-deaf survivor may remove 1 negative attribute token.
During the Overwhelming Darkness story event, each non-deaf survivor may select the Path of the Brave.

survival_of_the_fittest.name: Survival of the Fittest
survival_of_the_fittest.settlement_buff:
When rolling on the Intimacy story event, roll twice and pick the lowest result. All current and newborn survivors gain +1 strength and evasion.
Once per lifetime, a survivor may reroll a single roll result. They must keep this new result.
survival_of_the_fittest.desc:
When rolling on the Intimacy story event, roll twice and pick the lowest result. All current and newborn survivors gain +1 strength, +1 evasion.
Once per lifetime, a survivor may reroll a single roll result. They must keep the new result.

symposium.name: Symposium
symposium.settlement_buff: When a survivor innovates, draw an additional 2 Innovation Cards to choose from.

the_knowledge_worm.name: The Knowledge Worm
the_knowledge_worm.settlement_buff:
At the start of each settlement phase, add 1 scrap to settlement storage.
Departing Survivors gain +3 survival and +3 insanity. If any of those survivors have 10+ insanity, g A Gracious Host.
the_knowledge_worm.desc:
At the start of each settlement phase, add 1 scrap to settlement storage.
Departing Survivors gain +3 survival and +3 insanity. If any of those survivors have 10+ insanity, g A Gracious Host.

ultimate_weapon.name: Ultimate Weapon
ultimate_weapon.settlement_buff: When you defeat a monster, gain 1 monster resource of your choice from its resource deck.

umbilical_bank.name: Umbilical Bank
umbilical_bank.settlement_buff: When a survivor is born, you may add 1 Life String strange resource to storage.

war_room.name: War Room
war_room.settlement_buff: Quarries cannot move off of the hunt board. If the survivors would move backwards on the hunt board, roll 1d10. On a 4+ they don't.

dbk_resources.name: Dung Beetle Knight Resources
dbk_resources.selector_text: Dung Beetle Knight Resources (Dung Beetle Knight)

special_rules.name: Dead Guardian
special_rules.desc:
The sleeping predator is gone. Without its protective presence, intelligent monsters draw near.
  • You may only hunt Lvl 3+ monsters
  • All departing survivors must have 1 gear with the lantern keyword in their gear grid.
  • If the settlement has the Final Lantern, 1 survivor must depart with it in their gear grid.

The light of inspiration is extinguished. You cannot innovate.

mask_maker.name: Mask Maker
mask_maker.settlement_buff: A departing survivor with a mask in their gear grid may lead their hunting party to a legendary monster. Rules for these monsters are found on the Legendary Monster story event.

special_rules.name: Supernova
special_rules.desc: If you suffer defeat against a nemesis monster, the sun cleanses the settlement, instantly killing everyone. g Game Over

create_first_story_survivors.name: First Story
create_first_story_survivors.desc: Sets the quarry to be a White Lion, creates four new survivors and adds them to the Departing Survivors group.
summary: Two male and two female survivors are randomly generated.
Survivor Waist hit locations are set to 1.
Starting gear is added to settlement storage: 4x Cloth and 4x Founding Stone.
Survivors are added to the Departing Survivors group.
Quarry is set to White Lion (First Story).
create_first_story_survivors.warning: This macro was intended to be applied to new settlements at creation time! Apply this macro to existing settlements at your own risk...

increment_all_survivors_survival_by_1.name: Increase all Survivors' Survival by 1
increment_all_survivors_survival_by_1.desc: Increases the Survival of all living survivors by one.
summary: Survival is increased by one for all living survivors.
Dead survivors' sheets are not modified.
The event is logged in the settlement event log.

reduce_all_survivors_survival_to_0.name: Reduce all Survivors' Survival to 0
reduce_all_survivors_survival_to_0.desc: Reduces the Survival of all living survivors to zero.
summary: Survival is set to zero for all living survivors.
Dead survivors' sheets are not modified.
The event is logged in the settlement event log.

create_seven_swordsmen.name: Seven Swordsmen
create_seven_swordsmen.desc: Seven survivors with the "Ageless" ability and Sword mastery are randomly generated.
summary: Seven survivors are randomly generated (sex is randomized).
Each survivor's Abilities and Impairments are updated to include Ageless and Mastery - Sword.

white_gigalion.name: White Gigalion
white_gigalion.selector_text: White Gigalion (Vignettes Of Death White Gigalion)

death.name: Death

veined_wing.flavor_text: Blood drips from it at a constant rate.

venom_sac.name: Venom Sac
venom_sac.desc: Consume: Archive this card and roll 1d10. On a 1-5, you die instantly. On a 6+, gain the Death Touch Secret Fighting Art.
venom_sac.rules_text: Consume: Archive this card and roll 1d10. On a 1-5, you die instantly. On a 6+, gain the Death Touch Secret Fighting Art.

warbling_bloom.name: Warbling Bloom
warbling_bloom.desc:
Perishable.
You may plant this during the settlement phase to archive it and gain +1 population. The survivor is born with the Flower Addiction disorder and a face just like the Warbling Bloom's.
warbling_bloom.rules_text: You may plant this during the settlement phase to archive it and gain +1 population. The survivor is born with the Flower Addiction disorder and a face just like the Warbling Bloom's.

white_fur.name: White Fur
white_fur.desc: Luxurious and soft to the touch.
white_fur.flavor_text: Luxurious and soft to the touch.

wishbone.name: Wishbone
wishbone.desc: A delicate bone with a strange aura.
wishbone.flavor_text: A delicate bone with a strange aura.

ashen_claw_strain.name: Ashen Claw Strain
ashen_claw_strain.milestone_condition: The survivors are defeated by the Gold Smoke Knight. (Check for this at the end of your campaign.)
ashen_claw_strain.permanent_effect_flavor_text: Departing the smouldering scene, the Gold Smoke Knight unwittingly crushes the claw of a fleeing crab spider. Desperate to survive, the crab cauterizes its mangled claw on a nearby golden ember. It heals anew and much larger than before. The crab shares the secret with its crab family.
ashen_claw_strain.permanent_effect: Permanently add FA Armored Fist to your fighting art deck. Permanently add FA Fiddler Crab Spider to your vermin deck.

atmospheric_change.name: Atmospheric Change
atmospheric_change.milestone_condition: When the settlement triggers g Necrotoxic Mistletoe or g Story in the Snow.
atmospheric_change.permanent_effect_flavor_text: The settlement wakes to find itself transformed. An ever-present chill pimples the survivor's flesh. Occasionally, evanescent flakes of snow drift through the sky.
atmospheric_change.permanent_effect: Archive Heat Wave from the settlement event deck. Add Lump of Atnas basic resource to the basic resource deck.

carnage_worm.name: Carnage Worms
carnage_worm.milestone_condition: A Crazed survivor witnesses a settlement with Cannibalize endeavor 8 times at Sacrifice in a single lantern year.
carnage_worm.permanent_effect_flavor_text: The survivor holds a feast at the bloodied site of sacrifice. Attracted to the carnage, a parasitic worm of other origin is swept up into the survivor's maw. Now a host, the survivor spreads the parasite's young everywhere they defecate.
carnage_worm.permanent_effect: Permanently add FA Dark Manifestation to your fighting art deck. The survivor gains FA Dark Manifestation .

ethereal_culture_strain.name: Ethereal Culture Strain
ethereal_culture_strain.milestone_condition: When a survivor consumes a Brain Mint gear while there are 4+ Black Lichen strange resources in settlement storage.
ethereal_culture_strain.permanent_effect_flavor_text: Black lichen in storage blooms, blanketing the settlement and its inhabitants with harmless spores. A bacteria carried in the Brain Mint forms a symbiotic mass of fungus in the unwitting survivor's brain. The survivor finds themselves communicating with something beyond.
ethereal_culture_strain.permanent_effect: Permanently add the Ethereal Pact fighting art to your fighting art deck. The survivor gains the Ethereal Pact fighting art.

giants_strain.name: Giant's Strain
giants_strain.milestone_condition: When a survivor with the Marrow Hunger impairment has a child from g Intimacy.
giants_strain.permanent_effect_flavor_text: Ardent spliters of bone gnaw into the survivor's brain, halting their pituitary function. The deviation is passed to their offspring.
giants_strain.permanent_effect: Permanently add the Giant's Blood fighting art to your fighting art deck. The survivor's newborn child gains the Giant's Blood fighting art (choose one in case of twins).

hyper_cerebellum.name: Hyper Cerebellum
hyper_cerebellum.milestone_condition: When two survivors with the Prey disorder have a newborn.
hyper_cerebellum.permanent_effect_flavor_text: The child is born with an enlarged brain capacity for awareness. Hyper-alert and raised fearful of the unknown, the child takes up the shield to protect themselves. Their aptitude for observation gives them skills with a shield no master could ever dream of.
hyper_cerebellum.permanent_effect: Permanently add the Shieldarang fighting art to your fighting art deck. The newborn survivor gains the Shieldarang fighting art, 3 levels of Shield weapon proficiency, and the Weak Spot disorder at the body hit location.

marrow_transformation.name: Marrow Transformation
marrow_transformation.milestone_condition: When the Hand removes a broken leg severe injury from a survivor with Bow weapon specialization.
marrow_transformation.permanent_effect_flavor_text: Knit together according to unfamiliar anatomical principles, the mended bones grow new configurations of connective tissue. Developing an unnaturally smooth gait, the survivor's pounding steps do not impede their aim.
marrow_transformation.permanent_effect: Permanently add the Rolling Gait fighting art to your fighting art deck. The survivor gains the Rolling Gait fighting art.

material_feedback_strain.name: Material Feedback Strain
material_feedback_strain.milestone_condition: A survivor archives 4 resources from their Hoarder disorder.
material_feedback_strain.permanent_effect_flavor_text: A calm wraps around the anxiously beating heart of the survivor, steadying their grasping hands. The deeply-felt sense of security keeps cortical stress levels low. Inheriting the positive chemical feedback between possession and serenity creates a powerful ally in the settlement stores.
material_feedback_strain.permanent_effect: Permanently add FA Stockist to your fighting art deck. The survivor gains FA Stockist.

memetic_symphony.name: Memetic Symphony
memetic_symphony.milestone_condition: During SE Weird Dream, a storyteller tells a Well Told account that includes a dreaming survivor hearing the Devil's Symphony.
memetic_symphony.permanent_effect_flavor_text: Still possessed by restless sleep, snatches of the malefic tune spread, humming in every mouth. Under the stone-faced ground, a massive lodestone vibrates sympathetically, perpetually attracting a rhythmic spree of frozen lightning. Its thunder echoes in all directions, the beat throbbing in every ear.
memetic_symphony.permanent_effect: Permanently add the Infernal Rhythm fighting art to your fighting art deck. The survivora gains the Infernal Rhythm fighting art.

opportunists_strain.name: Opportunist's Strain
opportunists_strain.milestone_condition: When a survivor with the Prey or Secretive disorder has 15+ insanity.
opportunists_strain.permanent_effect_flavor_text: The survivor eats in secret and forgoes sleep. Their extreme paranoia liberates a deeply buried genetic memory that has allowed insignificant people to use their prey instincts to their advantage.
opportunists_strain.permanent_effect: Permanently add the Backstabber fighting art to your fighting art deck. The survivor gains the Backstabber fighting art. They suffer permanent -1 strength and -1 evasion from lack of sleep!

plot_twist.name: Plot Twist
plot_twist.milestone_condition: If the settlement has remembered all the g White Secret stories.
plot_twist.permanent_effect_flavor_text: A White Speaker arrives with a new story. She cuts the listener. Cloudy lymphatic fluid struggles from their wound, forming a yellow disc. Reaching into it, the White Speaker pulls free a black lump. Add 1 Iron strange resource to the settlement storage.
plot_twist.permanent_effect: The next time a survivor would remember a g White Secret story, they recall the words recited under her breath instead. Permanently add the Story of Blood fighting art to your fighting art deck. That survivor gains the Story of Blood fighting art.

somatotropin_surge.name: Somatotropin Surge
somatotropin_surge.milestone_condition: The surviors of Deadrock defeat the White Gigalion in the vignette.
somatotropin_surge.permanent_effect_flavor_text: Enraged, the White Gigalion's pregnant mate overtakes the exhausted survivors, devouring them. Its guts twist audibly as the peculiar minerals of the lovelorn rock combine with the primitive concoction that is the survivors' frenzy drink. The volatile mixture wreaks havoc on the recessive genes of its unborn young, ensuring the Gigalion aberration continues.
somatotropin_surge.permanent_effect: Campaigns with the White Lion quarry may now also hunt the White Gigalion quarry.
somatotropin_surge.selector_text: Somatotropin Surge (Vignettes Of Death White Gigalion)

surgical_sight.name: Surgical Sight
surgical_sight.milestone_condition: When a survivor in a settlement with Ocular Parasites gains the Extra Sense fighting art.
surgical_sight.permanent_effect_flavor_text: Undetectable creatures in the fluid filter of the eyes transform perception. Skin cannot hide the pulleys and springs of muscle. Their workings are as plain as the stone-faced groud. The birth of ocular symbiosis is turbulent.
surgical_sight.permanent_effect: The survivor suffers the blind severe head injury. Permanently add the Convalescer fighting art to your fighting arts deck. The survivor gains the Convalescer fighting art.

sweat_stained_oath.name: Sweat Stained Oath
sweat_stained_oath.milestone_condition: A survivor gains a sword during the hunt or showdown and uses it to deliver the killing blow that lantern year.
sweat_stained_oath.permanent_effect_flavor_text: Lightning splits the sky, illuminating a blade-shaped castle that was not there before. Gouts of water spray from the castle. Mingling with the survivor's sweat, the rain hisses. In the sibilant sound, the survivor hears a challenge.
sweat_stained_oath.permanent_effect: Permanently add the FA Sword Oath to your fighting art deck. The survivor gains FA Sword Oath. Add SE Acid Rain to the next lantern year on the timeline.

trepanning_strain.name: Trepanning Strain
trepanning_strain.milestone_condition: When a survivor survives the Trepanning Barber Surgeon endeavor five times.
trepanning_strain.permanent_effect_flavor_text: Slipshod surgery has damaged the survivor's memory. When systems of the body fail, others rise up to compensate. Without the burden of triumphs and traumas, the indomitable will to live thrives.
trepanning_strain.permanent_effect: Permanently add the Infinite Lives fighting art to your fighting art deck. The survivor gains the Infinite Lives fighting art.

breccia.subtitle: of Deadrock
breccia.selector_text: Breccia of Deadrock (Vignettes Of Death White Gigalion)
